['', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelines', 'In this role, you will help our team interpret the performance data gathered from our write and read pipelines with statistical analysis and modeling.\xa0', 'A culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environment', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological dataExperience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languagesExperience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning frameworkExcellent oral and written communication skillsAn MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related fieldExperience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'At Catalog, we value perseverance, leadership, teamwork, science, and communication. You will have the opportunity to shape the future of an entirely new way of manipulating information. You will have a chance to formulate and solve challenging computing problems arising in this uncharted territory. You will have a chance to work and learn with a team of talented scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs, and a chance to wear multiple hats and grow with us.\xa0', 'Develop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computing', 'What you will do:', 'Responsibility, leadership, and trust', 'We hope that you will consider joining us for a chat; we promise it will be intriguing.', 'Experience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelinesDevelop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questionsDevelop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computingDefine and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelinesApply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecksCommunicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'Define and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelines', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Experience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languages', 'The challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistry', "At Catalog, we are building the world's first massive data storage and computing platform using DNA as the storage medium. As an information storage medium, DNA is unique in its stability over millennia (think fossils), information density (gigabits in a cellular volume), and replicability (billions of copies, made cheaply and efficiently). Among its many groundbreaking applications, these properties make DNA an attractive medium for high density storage of latency tolerant data and massively parallel computation. To this end, we are developing a novel exabyte-scale DNA computing platform and looking for motivated engineers to join us.", 'Communicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'Apply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecks', 'An MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related field', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writer', 'Develop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questions', 'An opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computing', 'Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning framework', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological data', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writerAn opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computingThe challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistryA culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environmentResponsibility, leadership, and trust', 'What we need:', 'Experience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0', 'What you want:']

['', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelines', 'In this role, you will help our team interpret the performance data gathered from our write and read pipelines with statistical analysis and modeling.\xa0', 'A culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environment', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological dataExperience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languagesExperience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning frameworkExcellent oral and written communication skillsAn MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related fieldExperience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'At Catalog, we value perseverance, leadership, teamwork, science, and communication. You will have the opportunity to shape the future of an entirely new way of manipulating information. You will have a chance to formulate and solve challenging computing problems arising in this uncharted territory. You will have a chance to work and learn with a team of talented scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs, and a chance to wear multiple hats and grow with us.\xa0', 'Develop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computing', 'What you will do:', 'Responsibility, leadership, and trust', 'We hope that you will consider joining us for a chat; we promise it will be intriguing.', 'Experience in a non-Academic/non-research environment', 'Work with a cross disciplinary team of scientists and engineers to analyze data gathered from our core pipelinesDevelop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questionsDevelop simulators to support strategic proof-of-concept demonstrations in DNA storage and computingDefine and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelinesApply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecksCommunicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'Define and implement an automated data analysis pipeline to complement our core pipelines', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Experience in developing cloud-based analysis pipelines in Python or in similar languages', 'The challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistry', "At Catalog, we are building the world's first massive data storage and computing platform using DNA as the storage medium. As an information storage medium, DNA is unique in its stability over millennia (think fossils), information density (gigabits in a cellular volume), and replicability (billions of copies, made cheaply and efficiently). Among its many groundbreaking applications, these properties make DNA an attractive medium for high density storage of latency tolerant data and massively parallel computation. To this end, we are developing a novel exabyte-scale DNA computing platform and looking for motivated engineers to join us.", 'Communicate results to a cross disciplinary audience', 'Apply machine learning to address analysis bottlenecks', 'An MS or PhD in applied statistics or a related field', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writer', 'Develop statistical models to predict performance, troubleshoot experiments, and answer “what if” questions', 'An opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computing', 'Facility with at least one cloud-based machine learning framework', 'Experience in developing statistical models to explain hardware, chemical, or biological data', 'Work with the world’s fastest DNA data storage writerAn opportunity to define the analysis pipeline for DNA data storage and computingThe challenge of modeling large heterogeneous data about software, hardware, and chemistryA culture of excellence embedded in a collegial and supportive environmentResponsibility, leadership, and trust', 'What we need:', 'Experience with analysis of NGS, imaging, or sensor data\xa0', 'What you want:']

['', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Seasoned, professional data scientist with 5-7 years of experience in healthcare industry ', '  Experience working in an entrepreneurial/startup environment   Experience in a clinical setting and/or solving clinical problems   Experience working directly with patients or clinicians   Experiences where you needed to learn quickly in a new field   Experience in consulting or similar roles where you needed to deeply understand a business need and problem spac e ', ' Experience in a clinical setting and/or solving clinical problems ', ' Oversees and provides guidance for solutions to complex technical problems by challenging traditional technical assumptions ', ' Experiences where you needed to learn quickly in a new field ', ' Strong communication skills and ability to interact with business stakeholders at varying levels in the organization ', 'About The Role', ' Development of predictive and diagnostic algorithms to support Digital Health initiatives through collaboration and physical or virtual collocation with a Digital Health application product development team ', ' Experience with healthcare algorithms, their implementation and integration into healthcare systems and workflows ', 'Additional Locations:', " Career GrowthAt Boston Scientific, you will find a collaborative culture driven by a passion for innovation that keeps us connected on the most essential level. With determination, imagination and a deep caring for human life, we’re solving some of the most important healthcare industry challenges. Together, we’re one global team committed to making a difference in people’s lives around the world. This is a place where you can find a career with meaningful purpose—improving lives through your life’s work.About The RoleBoston Scientific is seeking an experienced Principal Data Scientist within the IT organization. This individual will have a unique opportunity to work across externally facing Digital Health initiatives as well internal data efforts to enable advanced analytics for the enterprise. This individual will have both a hands-on and strategic role in data science and data engineering efforts and will also help to define the future team structure and roles needed to accelerate advanced analytics at Boston Scientific.Your Respnsibilites Include  Development of predictive and diagnostic algorithms to support Digital Health initiatives through collaboration and physical or virtual collocation with a Digital Health application product development team   Assess internal data and processes to determine opportunities for application of advanced analytics to support internal business operations   Development of advanced analytics capabilities to improve internal business efficiencies   Collaborate with leadership on development and execution of advanced analytics strategic and tactical road maps   Train junior data engineers on advanced analytics tools, models, etc. and provide technical leadership for the IT organization   Analyze the analytics needs of functional departments, divisions and regions and makes recommendations for implementing advanced analytics solutions to support functional initiatives   Work collaboratively with cross-functional and technical teams to provide strategic direction to global groups and serve as an advocate to promote the benefits of existing and new analytics platforms and capabilities   Promotes and supports the principles and standards of the enterprise architecture and enterprise supported technologies   Additional Responsibilities   Collaborate with Data Architects, Data Engineers and Product Managers to contribute to the overall data modeling strategy and information flow decisions   Promotes simplified integrations and analytics solutions with a business process first approach   Support the development of integration systems throughout the Software Development Lifecycle according to the IT methodology, department SOP’s, and team guidelines   Maintains validated systems within the advanced analytics scope in accordance with internal software validation procedures and compliance to external controls such as GDPR, HIPAA, etc.   Oversees and provides guidance for solutions to complex technical problems by challenging traditional technical assumptions   Identifies innovative uses of Information Technology to provide a competitive advantage in healthcare analytics for Boston Scientific   Stays up-to-date with emerging business problems and how the industry is using AI/ML techniques   Participate and take lead role in enterprise communities of practice for analytics, AI, ML, etc.  Basic QualificationsWhat we're looking for:  Master’s level degree in engineering, statistics or mathematics  Seasoned, professional data scientist with 5-7 years of experience in healthcare industry   Expert in math and statistics with demonstrated ability using data to make intelligent business predictions and continually improves the way the company uses data   Experience managing or leading junior data scientists or teams with data engineering roles   Experience with agile methodology, design thinking, and lean startup approach   Experience with healthcare algorithms, their implementation and integration into healthcare systems and workflows   Strong communication skills and ability to interact with business stakeholders at varying levels in the organization   Able to understand/define business problem statements clearly   Multiple domain specialties in data and analytics   Understands statistical and ML/AL algorithms and how different parameters impact outcomes   Able to explain findings (statistical and analytical) to business partners and what they mean from business perspective, defines business value   Working knowledge of emerging cloud AI platforms and vendor’s analytics offerings   Have broad experience and expertise working with various technologies such as Python, SQL, R, SAS, Apache Spark MLib, Scala, BigML, D3, MATLAB, Google AI, Google Analytics, TensorFlow, Microsoft CNTK, Tableau and other frameworks and libraries for AI   Able to work on a team in person and in a collaborative virtual setting; self-motivated, self-directed, adaptable   Proven experience working in a regulated environment with quality systems which includes strong documentation skills, experience with Software-as-a-Medical Device a plus   Experience with software development life cycle, Waterfall, Agile and Dev/Ops methodologies  Transferrable Skills/ExperiencesWith the right mindset and ability to learn quickly on the job, the right candidate can thrive from a variety of functional backgrounds. A few of the examples of experiences and skills that will translate well as a successful Principal Data Scientist:  Experience working in an entrepreneurial/startup environment   Experience in a clinical setting and/or solving clinical problems   Experience working directly with patients or clinicians   Experiences where you needed to learn quickly in a new field   Experience in consulting or similar roles where you needed to deeply understand a business need and problem spac e About UsAs a global medical technology leader for more than 35 years, our mission at Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX) is to transform lives through innovative medical solutions that improve the health of patients. ['', "Our department supports Global Data's software development and technical operations to shorten the development lifecycle – enabling us to provide data quickly and efficiently. We are leveraging advanced data processing and NLP as part of our pre-processing strategy. You will get exposure to our proprietary data pipelining, information extraction, and enrichment operations as part of our data processing paradigm.", "An autonomous, creative engineer who loves technology, is endlessly curious, aggressively inquisitive, and an advocate for best practicesYou're a systems thinker who can see the big picture and understand how to break a larger problem down into smaller pieces that can be solved independentlySomeone who is aligned to and excited by our departments core mission to build community, evolve and drive impactYou can build a network and find new opportunities for improvement", 'Systems thinkers – an interest or a natural preference to think about system architecture and how things work together', '4+ years experience programming and scripting in Python within a production environment2+ years experience with data modeling within SQL and NoSQL databases2+ years experience working with restful APIsDeep understanding of large-scale, distributed systems with an ability to understand large systems with minimal documentationLegal authorization to work full-time in the United States and will not require visa sponsorship', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status', 'Someone who is aligned to and excited by our departments core mission to build community, evolve and drive impact', 'You can build a network and find new opportunities for improvement', 'Apply your python coding skills to help advance our goal of automating the influx of data and creating ETL solutions for our internal teamsEvangelize technical solutions and innovations among teams for further applicationIdentify strategic department level technical gaps in our ecosystem and advocate for new technologies and techniquesLeverage your development experience to build systems that are complete and robust enough to weave the data between automation and human expertiseHelp build systems that utilize Machine Learning techniques to learn from human SME knowledge and actions', '2+ years experience working with restful APIs', "Utilizing our modular tech stack, we are excited to expand both the data we process and the insights we provide. We are focused on combining and contributing to existing systems to build larger, more useful pipelines and services. We will work together to identify future projects and areas where we can have an impact. You'll be part of a team building data-driven systems supporting our internal businesses across Data Analytics, News, Research & Enterprise Data.", "At Bloomberg, our products are fueled by powerful data. Our Global Data department combines technology with product expertise to bring unequalled value to the world's information. This information comes from a variety of sources both structured and unstructured, including company filings, web scraped content and alternative data. We collect, analyze, process and publish the data which is the backbone of our iconic Bloomberg Terminal & data products that ultimately drive the financial markets.", 'An autonomous, creative engineer who loves technology, is endlessly curious, aggressively inquisitive, and an advocate for best practices', '2+ years experience with data modeling within SQL and NoSQL databases', 'Legal authorization to work full-time in the United States and will not require visa sponsorship', 'Help build systems that utilize Machine Learning techniques to learn from human SME knowledge and actions', 'Leverage your development experience to build systems that are complete and robust enough to weave the data between automation and human expertise', 'Apply your python coding skills to help advance our goal of automating the influx of data and creating ETL solutions for our internal teams', "You're a systems thinker who can see the big picture and understand how to break a larger problem down into smaller pieces that can be solved independently", 'Deep understanding of large-scale, distributed systems with an ability to understand large systems with minimal documentation', "Our department arose from a need to transform our business from largely manual processes to more scalable automated solutions. In order to continue the evolution of our data management operations, we are creating systems to manage the relentless flow of information. This not only saves us time and money but helps us deliver richer more actionable content. We're growing our team in order to scale our technology capabilities and expand the range of acquisition, extraction and enrichment techniques we use for automation.", 'Identify strategic department level technical gaps in our ecosystem and advocate for new technologies and techniques', 'Evangelize technical solutions and innovations among teams for further application', '4+ years experience programming and scripting in Python within a production environment']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Responsibilities:', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'General Requirements:', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0', 'Required Skills: SQL, Python, R, data visualization tools', 'Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0', 'Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0', 'Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests, connecting them with others who share those interests, and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. As our second full-time Data team member, you’ll have an opportunity to work cross-functionally with teammates from Operations, Product, Marketing, and other internal teams as they tackle a variety of challenges and opportunities. You’ll help shape our strategy by sharing key insights, digging into some of our most pressing problems, and finding creative ways to use data to improve our products and services.']

Able to work well with interdisciplinary teams representing Clinical Pharmacology and Nonclinical.', ' Proficiency with computers including MS Word, MS PowerPoint, and MS Excel is required.', ' Equivalent combination of education and experience.', ' Assist in the planning, design and implementation PK data transfer plans from external vendors to Exelixis and from Exelixis to external vendors. Perform quality check of preclinical and clinical PK/TK data and reports and PK sections of regulatory documents (IND, IB, and NDA). Work with PK scientists and multiple functions to perform PK data cleaning and reconciliation for clinical studies. Support archiving of the final preclinical DMPK and clinical PK data and reports. Perform literature search to support PK data analysis.', ' General knowledge of pharmacokinetics, pharmacology and immunology theories and practices is a plus.', ' Ability to perform in a fast-paced environment and be flexible an ability to adapt to changing work conditions.', 'Position Description', ' Collaborate with other project team members.']

['', 'Designing and initiating original research or projects designed to fulfill the policy analysis responsibilities of the division. Initiating, developing, and carrying out research of consumer financial product markets designed to deepen understanding of how they function and how households and firms behave. Issues researched may include determinants of payment, saving, investment, borrowing and credit behavior; consumer understanding of risk and its influence on financial decisions, or the impact of advisors and advisory services on consumer choice.', 'Summary', 'Conducting studies regarding consumer economic decision-making, particularly with regard to aspects of these practices relevant to consumer protection and government policy. Preparing in-depth, complete issue and position papers, as well as in-depth reports and presentation materials on areas of study, including making recommendations for action or policy based on the social/decision-making research. Preparing research papers and presentations that may be delivered to CFPB staff, to external seminars and conferences, and for publication in professional journals. Reviewing and commenting on research papers drafted by other CFPB staff, or by other persons writing on matters relevant to CFPB’s mission.', 'Responsibilities', 'Gathering, synthesizing, analyzing and interpreting social and decision-making data and information to inform and participate in the policy process. Locating and addressing new and unique issues in consumer financial services markets, provide studies of decision-making in various markets and industries, assist with implementation of policies, and evaluate existing policies. ['', 'Ph.D. in Computational Biology, Bioinformatics, Biostatistics, Genetics, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, or a related field.At least 5 years of experience working in the field data science and/or computational biology.\xa0Preferably 10 years or more experience.Knowledge of biology, particularly in relation to microbial metabolic engineering and discovery.Hands-on experience in analysis of RNA-seq or microarrays, and other large-scale omics datasets.Strong quantitative skills and a background in statistical data analysis and machine learning.Experience in writing robust code in R or Python.Working knowledge of code repository best practices and distributed version control.Exceptional communication skills, with an ability to convey complex computational results to colleagues from a wide range of life sciences backgrounds.Ability to work within a team, across functions (synthetic biology, analytical biochemistry, software, data science), and as an independent contributor, requiring minimal supervision.Ability to lead cross-functional teams to efficiently execute against aggressive goals.', 'We are looking for a quantitative Scientist\xa0with\xa0extensive experience in data science & computational biology. Ideal candidates will have demonstrated experience conducting creative and independent research analyzing a broad range of public and internally generated datasets, with emphases on experimental design, pattern discovery, and predictive modeling.', 'Ability to work within a team, across functions (synthetic biology, analytical biochemistry, software, data science), and as an independent contributor, requiring minimal supervision.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Knowledge of biology, particularly in relation to microbial metabolic engineering and discovery.', 'Design of high throughput, CRISPR based editing experiments using the Onyx™ Digital Genome Engineering Platform.', 'The role can be remote, with regular travel to Pleasanton, CA and Boulder, CO.', 'Develop new algorithms and maintain bioinformatics & data science pipelines.', 'Create and deliver both internal & public presentations on use of the Onyx™ platform to enable rapid Forward Genome Engineering & Discovery.', 'Requirements:', 'Development of tools and reports that integrate genetics and functional genomics to drive new target prediction and summarizing the results in ways that enable effective decision making.', 'Experience in writing robust code in R or Python.', 'Senior Scientist or Associate Director of Data Science', 'Hands-on experience in analysis of RNA-seq or microarrays, and other large-scale omics datasets.', 'Strong quantitative skills and a background in statistical data analysis and machine learning.', 'Discovery and elucidation of causal genetic factors in massively parallel genome editing experiments.\xa0', "Inscripta\xa0is developing the world's first scalable platform for benchtop Digital Genome Engineering. The company’s advanced CRISPR-based platform, consisting of an instrument, reagents, and software, will offer a fully automated workflow that enables multiplexed, trackable editing of cells at an unprecedented scale. Inscripta’s goal is to empower scientists whose gene editing research is stifled by current technical and licensing limitations. By providing this unique platform and engaging in collaborative business practices, such as making its MAD7 CRISPR nuclease free for research purposes, the company enables scientists to realize a new era of biological discovery.\xa0Due to rapid growth Inscripta has an opening for a\xa0Senior Scientist or Associate Director of Data Science.\xa0", "Inscripta\xa0offers a competitive base salary, bonus plan, benefits package and stock options to all team members.\xa0Join us and work with a great team of people developing the world's first scalable platform for benchtop Digital Genome Engineering. ['', 'Job Overview', 'The Data Engineer will be responsible for the technical operation of the Opportunity Insights Economic Tracker. This person will report to the Principal Investigators, and work closely with the research team, web developers, and other OI staff to support the ongoing operation, continued expansion, and both internal and external usage of the OI Economic Tracker.', '3+ years of work experience in a data engineering or data science roleSignificant experience creating and managing applications with cloud infrastructure, version control, and data automation/pipelinesExperience processing large amounts of structured data, including integrating data from multiple sources.Ability to implement reliable ETL (extract, transform, load) processes drawing from APIs, public websites, and server-based data transfers.Ability to independently manage complex systems handling multi-terabyte databases.Knowledge of best practices for managing multi-terabyte datasets, including creating systems for ongoing access and analysis by team members.', 'Location', 'With oversight from the research team, work with the web developers to troubleshoot and solve errors in data aggregation or visualizations on the Economic Tracker that may connect back to source code, data synchronization, or other issue areas.', '\xa0', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, pregnancy and pregnancy-related conditions or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'NPR', 'Commitment to task ownership and ability to operate under deadlines', 'Qualifications', 'Enthusiasm for using data science to improve research and policymaking', 'As time permits, support data processes for other research projects at Opportunity Insights', 'New York Times', 'This is a twelve-month contract position, with an ASAP start date. In your cover letter, please include information about relevant work experience and your interest in this role.', 'Commitment to data privacy and data security', 'Attention to detail and commitment to error-free work', 'Option to work remotelyOption to work in Cambridge, MA once Opportunity Insights office re-opensMust have legal ability to work in the United States and a Social Security Number', 'Respond to technical issues that may arise in data inflows to and outflows from the OI Economic Tracker.', 'Effective communication with Principal Investigators and other OI staff', 'Design and maintain robust server management capacities for the OI Economic Tracker that reflects a structure that is aligned with best practices, maximizes efficiency and has the flexibility to add in expanded data over the long term.', 'As an organization focused on economic mobility, we value having a diverse staff and particularly encourage applications from groups traditionally under-represented in software engineering and economics. ['Company Overview:', 'Education', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'WORKING CONDITIONS', 'REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Related Work Experience', "Company Overview:Charter Communications is America’s fastest growing TV, internet and voice company. We’re committed to integrating the highest quality service with superior entertainment and communications products. Charter is at the intersection of technology and entertainment, facilitating essential communications that connect 24 million residential and business customers in 41 states. Our commitment to serving customers and exceeding their expectations is the bedrock of Charter’s business strategy and it’s the philosophy that guides our 90,000 employees.JOB SUMMARYThe Advanced Analytics group has implemented and is operating a new advanced Big Data analytics platform that enables new self-service analytics, decision engineering support, machine learning, modeling, forecasting, and optimizations in Charter’s Advanced Engineering organization. This position is responsible to create and maintain scalable, reliable, consistent and repeatable platforms, systems, and models that support data, data products, and analytical products for advanced analytics by gathering, processing, exploring, and modeling raw and diverse data at scale. It requires lifecycle management of multiple data sources, data discovery, and models. This position architects and delivers models, analytics, automation, and self-service, which are major tenets of the analytics platform.The most successful candidate will have lifecycle experience in machine learning, deep learning, and/or artificial intelligence within modern parallel environments, such as GPU-enabled platforms and distributed clusters. This lifecycle includes conceiving, developing, prototyping, analyzing, and implementing models with very large (i.e., the top end of big data) and diverse datasets and in collaboration with stakeholders. Desirable experience includes using big data platforms for sources (e.g., Snowflake, AWS/s3, and Hadoop) to create deep learning and machine learning models with GPU-based Python (e.g., NVIDIA/DGX/RAPIDS).MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESFrames and models meaningful business and engineering scenarios that impact critical business and engineering processes, architectures, and/or decisionsResearches, develops, and implements machine learning models, deep learning models, artificial intelligence, and algorithms that solve business and engineering problemsDevelops innovative and effective approaches to solve model problems while communicating the results and methodologiesLeverages multiple data sources to produce products that solve the needs of business and engineering for descriptive models, predictive models, diagnostic models, and prescriptive modelsApplies data mining, data discovery, machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence techniques to large structured and unstructured datasets for model creationGathers and processes raw data at scale from any source and in any formatBalances workloads and operational demands with open source technologies, cloud services, and commercial solutions while optimizing cost and time-to-solution demandsCreates highly reusable code modules, templates, and packages that can be leveraged across model lifecycleIncreases speed to delivery by architecting and implementing automated solutionsMentors, educates, and provides senior leadership to data scientists, data analysts, and data engineersREQUIRED QUALIFICATIONSAbility to create proof of concept experiments for analytics, machine learning, or visualization tools that includes hypothesis, test plans, and outcome analysis.Ability to create unsupervised and supervised models. Time series expertise is a plus.Solid statistical knowledge and techniques.Exceptional programming skills in PythonExperience with one of the deep learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.Develop highly scalable systems, algorithms, and tools to support machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence solutions.Lifecycle management using Docker and containerization.Experience with Snowflake, AWS, Hadoop, and/or Spark.Excellent pattern recognition and predictive modeling skills.Extracting data and delivering complete analytics and machine learning products primarily using Python; secondary experience with R, Java, Javascript, C, C++, Scala, or Julia is an asset.Work closely with other data scientists, data engineers, and systems/infrastructure teams to deploy end-to-end models capable of serving production traffic in real-time.Develop, integrate and optimize model/AI/ML/DL pipelines.Leverage modern parallel environments, e.g. distributed clusters, multicore SMP, GPU, TPU and FPGA.Design and implement feedback loops for continual model updates and improvementsExperience receiving, converting, and cleansing big data.Visualization or BI tools, such as Tableau, Microstrategy, RapidMiner, or anything Microsoft Power BI.Program, product, or project management experience delivering model and analytics results.Strong background in Linux/Unix/CentOS/MacOS and Windows installation and administration.Keen attention to detail with the ability to effectively prioritize and execute multiple tasks.Ability to read, write, speak and understand English.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSJupyter Notebooks, NVIDIA GPU-based Deep Learning, and NVIDIA RAPIDS.Familiarity with APIs: Javascript API, Rest API or Data Extract APIs.Familiarity with data workflow/data prep platforms, such as Alteryx, Pentaho, or KNIME.Familiarity with DevOps/CI/CD/automation/configuration/orchestration management using Puppet, Chef, Ansible, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Airflow, or equivalents.Knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available service.Knowledge of Agile, Scrum, and SAFe environments. Experience delivering within these environment a plus.EducationBachelor's degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field required.Master’s degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field preferred.Related Work Experience3-5+ years of experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, deep learning, recommendation systems, natural language processing, fraud detection or artificial intelligence3-5+ years of experience of lifecycle management in one or more of the following from idea to deployment: artificial intelligence, deep learning models, machine learning models, recommendation systems, natural language processing, or fraud detection.3-5+ years of experience in data engineering position and/or software development.Experience delivering multiple systems where candidate was responsible for designing the architecture, implementing, operating, supporting, and managing the release lifecycle from inception to end of life.7-10+ years of hands-on working experience with Python, RDBMS, SQL, scripting, and coding.Proven experience in translating insights into business recommendations.WORKING CONDITIONSCharter Technical Engineering CenterHighly collaborative and innovative work spaceOccasional Travel ", 'The health and safety of our employees and candidates is very important to us. Spectrum has adopted virtual mobile recruiting tools that allow us to continue meeting new candidates. We look forward to “virtually” meeting you.The Spectrum brands (including Spectrum Networks, Spectrum Enterprise and Spectrum Reach) are powered and innovated by Charter Communications. Charter Communications reaffirms its commitment to providing equal opportunities for employment and advancement to qualified employees and applicants. Individuals will be considered for positions for which they meet the minimum qualifications and are able to perform without regard to race, color, gender, age, religion, disability, national origin, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws.']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Required Qualifications', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Stakeholder management skills. ', '5+ years of relevant professional experience ', 'Responsibilities:', "5+ years of relevant professional experience Experience with Hadoop (or similar) Ecosystem (MapReduce, Yarn, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Presto, Pig, HBase, Parquet) Proficient in at least one of the SQL languages (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SqlServer, Oracle) Good understanding of SQL Engine and able to conduct advanced performance tuning Strong skills in a scripting language (Python, Ruby, Bash) 1+ years of experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Oozie, Azkaban, UC4) Comfortable working directly with data analytics to bridge Lyft's business goals with data engineering ", 'If you feel that you would be a strong fit for this role, please send your resume directly to jbusbee@lyft.com', '1+ years of experience with workflow management tools (Airflow, Oozie, Azkaban, UC4) ', ' ', 'San Francisco', "As a Data Engineer at Lyft, you will be a part of an early stage team that builds the data transport, collection, and storage, and exposes services that make data a first-class citizen at Lyft. We are looking for a Data Engineer to build a scalable data platform. You'll have ownership of our core data pipeline that powers Lyft’s top-line metrics; You will also use data expertise to help evolve data models in several components of the data stack; You will help architect, building, and launching scalable data pipelines to support Lyft’s growing data processing and analytics needs. Your efforts will allow access to business and user behavior insights, using huge amounts of Lyft data to fuel several teams such as Analytics, Data Science, Marketplace, and many others. ", 'Proficient in at least one of the SQL languages (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SqlServer, Oracle) ', 'Strong skills in a scripting language (Python, Ruby, Bash) ', 'You will report to a Data Engineering Manager. ', 'Experience:', ' Lyft HQ\xa0', 'Responsibilities:Owner of the core company data pipeline, responsible for scaling up data processing flow to meet the rapid data growth at LyftEvolve data model and data schema based on business and engineering needsImplement systems tracking data quality and consistencyDevelop tools supporting self-service data pipeline management (ETL)SQL and MapReduce job tuning to improve data processing performanceExperience: ', 'Experience with Hadoop (or similar) Ecosystem (MapReduce, Yarn, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Presto, Pig, HBase, Parquet) ', "Comfortable working directly with data analytics to bridge Lyft's business goals with data engineering ", 'jbusbee@lyft.com', 'Good understanding of SQL Engine and able to conduct advanced performance tuning ', 'Lyft', 'Randstad iMSP', 'Software Engineer']

['Mentor, coach and lead a team of approximately 4 data science engineers.', 'We are looking for a highly qualified Data Scientist, Team Lead for our Predictive Analytics for Prescriptive Maintenance team who has a strong background data mining, statistical prediction, and machine learning. ', 'Ability to focus on solving customer problems with the primary emphasis on business value', 'You will be expected to research, develop and deliver advanced analytics models to predict the failure of key components in wind turbines.', 'Backend Experience: Hadoop, HBase, Time-series database', 'Degree of Master of Science with 5-10 years electrical engineering, computer science or related field. PhD preferred but not required.', "What You'll Do", 'Experience building and deploying data science models in production', ' Technical experience in: Statistical modeling, predictive analytics, probabilistic forecasting. ', 'Experience in agile development environment', 'Job Description', 'Technical experience in: Statistical modeling, predictive analytics, probabilistic forecasting. ', 'A desire to look for innovative data science approaches at scale', 'Design, define, develop statistical and machine learning models that ingest historical and real time sensor data and predict the failure of probability components.', 'Lead Data Scientist ', 'Soft Skills: Team collaboration, desire to mentor, professionally develop and supervise', 'Tool experience in: Python (Pandas, Scikit, TensorFlow), R, Gitlab', 'Model predictive analytics based on the real world problem in particular with multi-variate time-series data.']

['Senior Machine Learning Engineer – NLP ExpertNew York City - NY$150,0000 - 180,000 base + Great Benefit Package\xa0This is an opportunity for a well-rounded Data Scientist to cut their teeth in a data-first, fast paced environment where they are designing unique infrastructure to change B2B data. Working with some the leaders in the industry, you will be responsible for putting your Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning models into production. If you are an NLP, Machine Learning expert, this role could be a great fit.THE COMPANYAs a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, with and NLP focus, you’ll find yourself using machine learning techniques in this B2B powerhouse and the power of data to innovate the way we extract information form the internet.THE ROLE\xa0You will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects.· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop different types of machine learning models from NLP to anomaly detection· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop production level code in Python and deliver high quality solutions· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work cross functionally with the data engineering and research analyst teams· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Present your findings to business leaders and stakeholders within the companyYOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEYou will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. Commercial experience with hands on experience putting Machine Learning projects into production is a must,· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of Deep Learning frameworks· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior exposure to putting Machine Learning and Deep Learning models into production· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior work presenting key findings to stakeholders· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science, Linguistics, Engineering, Stats, or a related field· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Technically sound in NLP, TensorFlow, NLTK, ELMo, GloVe, spaCy, WordNetTHE BENEFITSA base salary of $150,000 - $180,000 + amazing benefitsHOW TO APPLYPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.']

['', 'Experience with natural language processing would be very useful.', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'Work collaboratively with designers, engineers, customer service, and the community team.', 'NCSOFT is a premiere digital entertainment company and global publisher with worldwide locations and more than 4,000 employees focused on bringing extraordinary games to life for millions of fans around the world. Established in 1997 and headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, we quickly became a key leader in online games. Best known for critically acclaimed franchises including Lineage, Aion, Guild Wars, and Blade & Soul, NCSOFT is also one of the world’s top mobile developers with Lineage 2M occupying the #1 grossing revenue slot on Google Play. Our core goal is to make people in this world happier by delivering games that entertain a globally connected audience has remained the same.', 'Prior experience in fraud detection.Experience playing NCSOFT and ArenaNet games.Experience with big data software like Hadoop.Experience with other Business Intelligence backend and analytics applications.', 'Ability to effectively communicate with people at various levels of business and technical expertise, including the ability to simplify difficult technical concepts.', 'You are a passionate gamer', 'Strong quantitative skills, and experience utilizing scientific analytic methods, qualitative methods, and quantitative analysis techniques, as well as predictive modeling.', 'PLUSES', 'A passion for games and the gaming industry.', '5+ years hands-on experience working with data.', 'Ability to translate academic research into application.', 'We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our Fraud and Game Surveillance Unit and help us keep our games safe and fun for all our players.\xa0We are looking for someone with a burning curiosity about our players and our games, someone who can go deep to find answers and bring back actionable insights.\xa0The ideal candidate is equally passionate about machine learning and improving the player experience.\xa0This role will partner closely with design, engineering, and customer service to help create and maintain a safe and welcoming environment for all our players.\xa0You will help build tools to detect toxic chat and sift PvP match records to find cheats and bots.\xa0This is your chance to help make our games safer, friendlier, and more fun.', 'Conduct quantitative and statistical analyses on gameplay and financial data.', 'Bachelor’s degree in statistics, analytics, data science, psychology, or related quantitative field. MS or PhD strongly preferred.', 'You enjoy creating positive user experiences. ', 'Create and maintain accurate and comprehensible data visualizations and dashboards.', 'You are a passionate gamer. You will join us in supporting multiple AAA titles. We are all gamers and we love helping our fellow players!', 'Demonstrated history of turning raw data into actionable insights.', 'You enjoy creating positive user experiences. This is at the core of what we do. You think about how we best prevent players from having to contact us and how to make their interactions with our team seamless. You learn from negative feedback and get satisfaction from positive outcomes.', 'WHY JOIN THE CUSTOMER CARE TEAM?', 'Bachelor’s degree in statistics, analytics, data science, psychology, or related quantitative field. MS or PhD strongly preferred.5+ years hands-on experience working with data.Experience with natural language processing would be very useful.', 'You love to share your knowledge and experience. We know our games and our player base inside and out and we leverage that knowledge to drive improvement. You are good at finding ways to best impart your knowledge to internal teams and our customers.', "WHAT YOU'LL NEED TO BE SUCCESSFUL", 'A passion for games and the gaming industry.Demonstrated history of turning raw data into actionable insights.Advanced SQL proficiency, including experience querying and visualizing large, complex data sets.Strong quantitative skills, and experience utilizing scientific analytic methods, qualitative methods, and quantitative analysis techniques, as well as predictive modeling.Ability to effectively communicate with people at various levels of business and technical expertise, including the ability to simplify difficult technical concepts.Ability to translate academic research into application.', 'EDUCATION/TRAINING/EXPERIENCE', 'WHO WE ARE', 'Experience playing NCSOFT and ArenaNet games.', 'You love a challenge. You will encounter daily opportunities to overcome new challenges and problems. You thrive in a fast-pasted, high-volume work environment.', 'Advanced SQL proficiency, including experience querying and visualizing large, complex data sets.', 'You love to share your knowledge and experience', '.', 'Experience with other Business Intelligence backend and analytics applications.', 'Use SQL, Tableau, and other tools to query gameplay data.Conduct quantitative and statistical analyses on gameplay and financial data.Create and maintain accurate and comprehensible data visualizations and dashboards.Create and deploy machine learning models to model and predict player behavior.Work collaboratively with designers, engineers, customer service, and the community team.Stay actively engaged in our games and develop a deep understanding of game mechanics including gameplay and economy.', 'Experience with big data software like Hadoop.', 'You are a passionate gamer. You will join us in supporting multiple AAA titles. We are all gamers and we love helping our fellow players!You enjoy creating positive user experiences. This is at the core of what we do. You think about how we best prevent players from having to contact us and how to make their interactions with our team seamless. You learn from negative feedback and get satisfaction from positive outcomes.You love a challenge. You will encounter daily opportunities to overcome new challenges and problems. You thrive in a fast-pasted, high-volume work environment.You love to share your knowledge and experience. We know our games and our player base inside and out and we leverage that knowledge to drive improvement. You are good at finding ways to best impart your knowledge to internal teams and our customers.', 'Prior experience in fraud detection.', 'You love a challenge.', 'Stay actively engaged in our games and develop a deep understanding of game mechanics including gameplay and economy.', 'Create and deploy machine learning models to model and predict player behavior.', 'Use SQL, Tableau, and other tools to query gameplay data.']

job_title: Sr. Machine Learning Engineer (can be LA, SF or remote-based)
job_text: ['', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'You’ll apply machine learning and/or data science techniques to a variety of modeling and recommendation problems involving users, content creators and what engages them.You will participate in the engineering life-cycle at Oooh, including designing distributed systems, writing production code, conducting code reviews and working alongside our engineering, data-science and product teams.Collaborate with other engineers to develop data and model pipelinesApply machine learning and data science techniques and design distributed systems', 'Experience with content moderation systems', 'Experience working with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Caffe2, PyTorch, Spark ML, scikit-learn, or related frameworks', '*BONUS*', 'Solid understanding of the production machine learning workflow', 'You will participate in the engineering life-cycle at Oooh, including designing distributed systems, writing production code, conducting code reviews and working alongside our engineering, data-science and product teams.', 'Apply machine learning and data science techniques and design distributed systems', 'Usage of Docker and Kubernetes', 'Other typical startup life benefits - that you have a say in - as we grow', 'Experience with languages such as Python, Scala or Java', 'Oooh is a team of 25 who have built some of the biggest global phenomenons in video and video games and have come together with a moonshot mission. Backed by an incredible group of Silicon Valley and LA VC’s, founders, product and technology leaders and entertainment moguls—all of whom feel personally connected to our purpose—we’ve been quietly building a smarter and healthier next-gen digital platform focused on younger audiences. And, one that’s way more fun. That’s about all we are saying publicly right now :)', 'We’re now looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join our team! Working either from our Los Angeles or Kelowna, British Columbia Canada offices OR remotely you’ll be the first engineer dedicated to working on productionizing machine learning and computer vision technologies, and solving problems that range from architecting scalable infrastructure to building exciting product recommendation models.', '6+ years of Industry engineering', 'Maternity and Paternity Leave', 'EXPERIENCE', 'Experience with content moderation systemsExperience with data pipelines and ETL systemsWorking knowledge of distributed systems such as SparkUsage of Docker and Kubernetes', 'B.S., M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science or equivalent degree and work experience.6+ years of Industry engineeringSolid understanding of the production machine learning workflowExperience with personalization, content, social, gaming, moderation ML work', 'Computer vision with respect to object detection and image classification', 'PERKS', 'Premier Medical, Vision, Dental and Disability insurance', 'You’ll apply machine learning and/or data science techniques to a variety of modeling and recommendation problems involving users, content creators and what engages them.', 'Unlimited PTO', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Past experience with recommendation engines\xa0Computer vision with respect to object detection and image classificationEvaluation and setup off the shelf M/L engines and libraries\xa0Experience working with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Caffe2, PyTorch, Spark ML, scikit-learn, or related frameworksExperience with languages such as Python, Scala or Java', 'B.S., M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science or equivalent degree and work experience.', 'Collaborate with other engineers to develop data and model pipelines', 'Premier Medical, Vision, Dental and Disability insuranceUnlimited PTOMaternity and Paternity LeaveOther typical startup life benefits - that you have a say in - as we grow', 'Evaluation and setup off the shelf M/L engines and libraries\xa0', 'This role needs someone who brings domain expertise from the video/media, social or gaming worlds, and ideally having worked at platforms like YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, mobile gaming or companies leveraging similar types of ML technologies. Without relative past experience, you may not be a great fit for this first dedicated ML position.', 'Working knowledge of distributed systems such as Spark', 'Experience with data pipelines and ETL systems', 'Small team moving fast. All of the ownership with none of the BS.', 'Past experience with recommendation engines\xa0', 'Experience with personalization, content, social, gaming, moderation ML work', 'ENVIRONMENT']

['', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Prepare training material and hold technical training sessions for internal Spark users', 'BS/MS in Computer Science or related technical discipline', 'Solve production issues related to user Spark applications', '\xa0', 'Excellent communication and presentation skills', "Synergis Creative's recruiters have been a driving force of the creative and marketing space for over six years. We draw from a wealth of experience with technology staffing, industry best practices and exceptional connections to match candidates with incredible opportunities.", 'Duration: 12 month contract (medical, dental, vision benefits offered)', 'Good understanding of programming language like Java and Scala', 'We are a deeply data-driven company with data driving not only business decisions but also product features and directions. Our team is responsible for supporting one of the biggest in-house Hadoop/Spark infrastructure in Silicon Valley. We build infrastructure and tools to power thousands of AI engineers, data analytics, and software engineers within the company. We are also committed to being an early adopter and contributor to open source big data technologies, including Hadoop, Spark, and TensorFlow. We are looking for a data engineer with a focus on Hadoop and Spark to develop our Spark infrastructure and grow our Spark user groups. Your work will impact thousands of Spark users inside and outside the company.', 'Experience in building large scale applications with Spark SQL', 'Preferred qualifications', 'Synergis Creative is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer', 'Good understanding in Spark Core and Spark SQL engine', 'Title:\xa0Spark Software Engineer ', 'Experience in working with a data format on Hadoop/Spark like Avro, Orc, and Parquet', 'Good understanding of scripting language like Shell and Python', '(medical, dental, vision benefits offered)', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience with Interactive Spark Notebooks (Jupyter Notebooks)', 'Good understanding of distributed storage and computing systems', 'Good understanding of Spark, Hadoop, HDFS, YARN, Hive technologies', '1+ years of relevant work experience in Spark and Hadoop', 'Experience with tuning large scale Spark jobs', 'Interact with multiple groups on a daily basis to design data solutions and promote the best Spark practices among users', 'Duration: 12 month contract', 'Developing Spark infrastructure, Spark user libraries and tooling to make direct impact to users', 'Synergis Creative (creative.synergishr.com) is a specialized division of Synergis (www.synergishr.com) that serves the needs of leading creative firms, departments and agencies. Synergis Creative carefully matches creative and marketing talent to a full-time, contract or project positions.', 'Experience in writing, analyzing, and debugging SQL queries using Hive and Spark SQL', 'Location: Remote ']

job_title: Quantitative UX Researcher - SQL & R/Python Required
job_text: ['With the news of COVID19 spreading, Aquent is committed to ensuring the safety and well being of our employees. This includes providing technology to support video interviews, resources and support for employees to work from home successfully, and fully covered healthcare for eligible employees. The position is remote until the stay at home order is lifted. Then you must be able to work onsite at the posted location. ', 'Nice to Have Requirements:– Practical experience in research communication to technical and non-technical audiences.– Prior experience of working on enterprise products is a plus.– Prior experience of working in the advertising industry is a plus.', '', 'With the news of COVID19 spreading, Aquent is committed to ensuring the safety and well being of our employees. This includes providing technology to support video interviews, resources and support for employees to work from home successfully, and fully covered healthcare for eligible employees. ', "\u200bAs a Quantitative UX Researcher, you combine skills in experimental design, statistical analysis, programming, and human-computer interaction to improve the user experience. As a key member of a product team, you work with stakeholders across functions and levels. You solve challenging problems and empower the team to move forward by developing metrics, measuring results and integrating new methodologies into existing systems. You do more than just crunch numbers: through reports and team engagement, you provide a UX perspective on quantitative data to help stakeholders understand their users. Coming up with solutions is only one part of your job. Equally important is to identify and quantify problems, and to embark on new research areas worth exploring through innovative methods. You apply principles of rigorous and ethical research to build and improve products that satisfy users' needs and exceed their expectations. ", 'Minimum Requirements:– 3+ Fluency in SQL– 3+ Mastery of R or Python– MS or PhD degree in Computer Science, Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology, Statistics, or a related field.– 3 years of relevant work experience with Quantitative User Experience or Human-Computer Interaction teams.– Expertise in multivariate statistics and the design of experiments.– Expertise in data visualization techniques and tools.– Expertise in the design, implementation, and analysis of large-scale surveys.– Proficiency in programming computational and statistical algorithms for large data sets.– Track record of demonstrating excellent command of research questions within a given domain, and of technical tools for the analysis of data within that field.– Track record of communicating with cross-functional stakeholders of varying levels. ', 'The position is remote until the stay at home order is lifted. Then you must be able to work onsite at the posted location.', 'Minimum Requirements:', 'Nice to Have Requirements:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Responsibilities:– Support existing research initiatives, prioritize and drive research to quantify and improve the advertiser user experience.– Support product development and design and provide confidence in decision making through thorough quantitative insights– \u200bDefine and measure quantitative UX goals and metrics in collaboration with Designers, Qualitative Researchers, Engineers, and Product Managers.– Examine existing data and product designs to generate hypotheses and plans for high-impact research.– Develop code and statistical models to understand user experience.– Drive change by communicating findings to stakeholders in the company. Make research findings convincing and actionable for both research experts and non-experts.– Facilitate high research impact through data visualization and novel research communication methods ', 'Our client, a F50 comapny & leader in many areas of technology, is looking for an experienced UX researcher with proficiency (3+ years) of SQL and R/Python, bonus points if a candidate has experience with an advertising or enterprise product. This is a 12+ month assignment with potential to extend with competitive pay. ', ' ']

Demonstrated ability to work in a team environment with good interpersonal, communication, writing and organizational skills. Acts as a resource/mentor to study team members - both internally and externally.', 'W2 ONLY', 'karen@alphaconsulting.com', 'This 12+ month position starts ASAP.', "+6 years' experience in healthcare or pharmaceutical is preferred.", 'Acts as a resource/mentor to study team members - both internally and externally.', 'Demonstrated ability to work in a team environment with good interpersonal, communication, writing and organizational skills.', "ALPHA'S REQUIREMENT #20-01470", 'Use advanced machine learning approaches to understand and improve clinical outcomes.', " Master's degree (PhD preferred) in a Data Science or related field (e.g. Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Bioinformatics, etc.). +6 years' experience in healthcare or pharmaceutical is preferred. Extensive hands-on experience applying data science tools in practice. Use advanced machine learning approaches to understand and improve clinical outcomes. Strong Programming experience with SQL and Python (Experience in R is good as well). In-depth knowledge of relational database principles and corresponding query language skills (e.g. SQL) is of interest. Experience with supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms, and ensemble methods, such as: K-Means, PCA, Regression, Neural Networks, Decision Trees, and Gradient Boosting etc.", 'Responsible for collaborating with cross functional teams, including but not limited to, clinicians, data scientist translational medicine scientist, statisticians, and IT professionals.', 'In-depth knowledge of relational database principles and corresponding query language skills (e.g. SQL) is of interest.', 'Provide scientific guidance on the application of Real World Evidence and Clinical research data to address issues across the Oncology and other therapeutic areas.', 'Manager is willing to accept candidates that are not local to the NJ area. This position will be remote.\u200b', 'Experience with supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms, and ensemble methods, such as: K-Means, PCA, Regression, Neural Networks, Decision Trees, and Gradient Boosting etc.', 'LAWRENCEVILLE, NJ', 'Please E-MAIL your resume (attachment to email) with rate and availability to Karen: ', 'Education, Qualifications, Skills and Experience:', 'Extensive hands-on experience applying data science tools in practice.', 'Project Description: ', 'A strong desire to understand why things work the way they do']

job_title: Machine Learning Engineer - node.js/ AWS for Recent IPO (100% Remote)
job_text: ['', 'AWS on the cloud.', 'They have completely revolutionized the homebuying experience and are one of the few companies whose eye for the future have made them unintentional benefactors of the pandemic.', 'Their Tech Stack across the business:', 'With the customer journey and experience at the forefront of everything you do, you’ll help decide the most appropriate next action and language necessary to produce an exceptional customer interaction- all while developing an AI personality that is engaging and memorable!', '.Net Core', 'If you are looking for a varied role where your work will be viewed by millions on people every week, all from the comfort of your home office, we welcome your application.', 'An example of one project you will be working on from day one, will be to assist in the build out of Intelligent Virtual Assistants (IVA’s) – aka chatbots leveraging AI enhancing realistic dialogue design and conversational flow to increase customer engagement and ensuring the consumer receives a human AI experience. ', 'Node.js', 'C#', '\xa0', '.Net CoreC#Node.jsAWS on the cloud.Angular', 'Angular', 'After a successful IPO launch at the start of August, my client is rapidly expanding their data science, AI/ML, fully remote team.', 'This role sits within their Data Science department, responsible for all things AI/ ML using best NLP practices.', 'Even before WFH was mandated by the pandemic, my client have been 100% remote for years. Therefore, you will be set up for success from day one with experienced, remote leaders at the helm.']

['', 'You will research and write news, feature articles and bonus reports for our premium (paid) newsletters that focus on natural resources, commodities, income investments and related stocks, options and ETFs.\xa0', 'Weiss currently rates approximately 55,000 institutions and investments, including nearly all U.S. banks, credit unions, and insurance companies, plus all listed stocks, ETFs and mutual funds. It has been recognized for its independence and accuracy by the U.S. Government Accountability Office (GAO), the U.S. Senate, various state governments, The New\xa0York Times, The Wall Street Journal, Forbes and many others.\xa0', 'At Weiss Ratings, we look to offer unique and often off-the-radar investment ideas and trading strategies to more than 500K readers. Our ideal candidate is familiar with investment markets and able to discover breakthrough opportunities in any kind of market conditions.', 'Excellent research skills and working knowledge of Excel, Word and Bloomberg.', 'Are you a compelling storyteller … excellent researcher… and strong writer who can turn big ideas into easy-to-read, actionable content for a wide audience? ', 'Experience creating published content on deadline for publication', "The right candidate lives in South Florida or is willing to relocate. We've found content creation to be easiest and most successful when our writers, marketers and editors collaborate in person.", "*** Weiss Ratings isn't responsible for covering moving expenses ***", 'Weiss Ratings LLC is seeking an experienced financial writer with big ideas, strong opinions and a passion for transforming interesting ideas into compelling copy.', 'Five writing samples showcasing your stock/investment research/picks', 'Initially this is a "ghost writer" position but we are interested in helping the right candidate grow into a "personality."', 'Proven track record of writing about winning investment ideas', 'investment ideas', 'Previous investment experience and clear understanding of financial markets, domestic and foreign economies, stocks, options, and related asset classes.', 'Education/Experience/Skills:', 'Weiss Ratings is a well-known publisher of financial ratings and investment newsletters since 1971. Our mission is to empower average investors and consumers to make prudent decisions and build their wealth safely.', 'Cover letterFive writing samples showcasing your stock/investment research/picksResume/CV', 'Because this position requires careful attention to detail, we will only consider applications that include:', 'Resume/CV', 'Cover letter', 'An obsession with details and finding "weird" facts that other researchers may miss', "Because our company provides research independent of Wall Street and the mainstream media, it's important to be able to take a stance. That means identifying problems, finding creative ways of solving those problems and proficiently building a case for or against potential solutions. ", '*** This is a full-time position, on-site in Palm Beach Gardens, FL***', 'Tell us a good story, starting with yours!', 'How to Apply:']

['', 'Basic Qualifications', '- Bachelor’s degree, with an emphasis on UX, design research, psychology, social science or another relevant field preferred, or equivalent experience', '- Effective presentation, verbal and written communication skills, and ability to facilitate collaborative sessions', 'Explore your career possibilities at U.S. Bank and join a company that’s as passionate as you are about helping our customers meet their goals and making a difference in the communities we live and work. Our industry-leading financial performance, innovative spirit and best-in-class reputation empower employees to succeed. U.S. Bank is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating a diverse workforce. We consider all qualified applicants without regard to race, religion, color, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status, among other factors.', 'Exciting opportunity! We are now hiring for a UX Researcher to work in our downtown Minneapolis, MN location. Note, during COVID-19 this role is temporarily full-time telecommute.', 'U.S. Bank is currently hiring an User Experience (UX) Researcher that will be part of a team that will be supporting the simplification of a user platform. The UX Researcher will conduct and deliver UX design research work that meets or exceeds the stated business goals and which is clearly and objectively measured and reported to prove our return on design investment. Leads and crafts UX research to ensure excellence in research, facilitation, artifacts, presentation skills, and distilling actionable insights for partners. Partners effectively with other UX disciplines, business line clients, product and channel management, marketing, analytics, delivery PMO, Information Technology and other teams to strengthen relationships and understand the business while delivering solid research. Derives measurable objectives against which UX research work will be evaluated for success.', 'Preferred Skills/Experience', '- Ability to deliver impactful and clear UX design research in a way that drives and directs better product/project outcomes', 'Explore what’s possible.', '- Demonstrated analytical, decision-making and problem-solving skills', 'In order to be formally considered for this opportunity, please apply online directly at: https://usbank.taleo.net/careersection/10000/jobdetail.ftl?lang=en&job=200011417&SRC=DS-10058', '- Familiar with a variety of research methodologies, when to apply them, and when to make tradeoffs', '- Familiar with agile project management and how UX research functions within it', '- Three to five years of UX design research experience']

', ' ', 'Work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and evaluate research topics. ', 'Bachelor’s or MS in a human behavior related field (or equivalent and demonstrable work experience) ', 'Ability to perform all research-related tasks including research, planning, evaluating, and iteration ', 'UX Researcher Responsibilities:', 'Plan and implement user research strategies and methodologies. ', 'Conduct primary and secondary user research. Conduct and evaluate quantitative and qualitative research. Perform market and ethnographic research. Work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and evaluate research topics. Plan and implement user research strategies and methodologies.
