job_title: Senior Data Scientist - Biology  - Work From Home
job_text: ['', 'Work from Home! Anywhere in the USA!', 'Education', '\xa0', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicate strategies, ideas, goals, and progress to the customer and the team.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficiency in one or more coding languages such as Perl, Python, R, or Java', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficiency with relational databases, NoSQL databases, and database design', 'Please send your resume to hr@ranchobiosciences or through LinkedIn and reference Job Code #2020-00033', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Unix-like operating systems', 'Senior Data Scientist', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong working experience with data wrangling, analysis, statistical, and machine learning methods, tools, platforms and frameworks', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Gather requirements from the customer and propose strategic directions and potential solutions.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0PhD degree in Life Sciences, Data Science, Computer Science, or equivalent', 'Responsibilities', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of data standards, semantics, terminologies, ontologies, and best practices for data governance. Familiarity with the FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable) data guiding principles is a plus', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate frequently with clinical scientists, statisticians, data curators, terminology experts, and database specialists.', 'Requirements', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa07+ years of computational, data science, and solution development domain experience in the pharma/biotech industry with thorough understanding of R&D processes, information systems, and the scientific data life cycle', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Plan and implement efforts to provide data curation, management, integration, and analytics solutions for laboratory and/or clinical data', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with VBA and Excel-based data wrangling methodologies', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with software development life cycle methodologies, unit and integration testing, and documentation development', 'Rancho Biosciences, a leader in Data Curation, is seeking a Senior Data Scientist with a degree in Biology or other science to design and implement data curation, management, integration, and analytics solutions on behalf of our pharmaceutical, academic and institutional clients.\xa0To be successful, you will need to be an expert problem solver with a strong understanding of the broad range of software technologies and platforms available.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0In collaboration with terminology management and curation teams, support the definition of new data standards, data models, terminologies, and ontologies.', 'Requirements\xa0', 'We are a Data Curation company working with some of the most renowned Pharmaceutical companies in the world. Our team of scientists, curators, computational biologists, biostatisticians and computer scientists are located throughout the country; we support talented people living where they chose, working collaboratively together on projects that have a real impact on human health.\xa0', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure to public biomedical ontologies and standards consortiums (e.g., BioPortal, MedDRA, MeSH, CDISC, Allotrope) is a plus']

['Job Description:', 'Location: Remote (must be willing to work PST hours)', '2+ years’ experience with SQL Server.\xa0', 'Location: ', '\xa0', '5+ years of data focused development experience.\xa0', 'Retail and/or e-commerce background.\xa0', 'Job Title:\xa0', 'Data Engineer\xa0', 'Interview Process: ', 'Job Description:\xa0', '2+ years’ experience working with Azure applications (Azure Data Factory, Azure Batch, Azure SQL Server, Azure Data Warehouse, Databricks etc.) and building out Azure pipelines.\xa0', '2+ years’ experience with Powershell and Terraform for scripting.\xa0', 'Must Haves\xa0', 'Job Title:\xa0Data Engineer\xa0', '6 month contract w/ on-going extensions', 'Interest in and/or working experience with big data pipelines (Spark, Azure ML Studio, etc.).\xa0', 'Experience working for a multi-channel retailer.\xa0', '2+ years working with ETL and Microsoft SQL Server for store procedures.\xa0', '1+ year of experience working in an Agile environment.\xa0', 'Day to Day\xa0', 'Plusses\xa0', '2+ years’ experience working with Python for integrations.\xa0', 'Duration:\xa0', 'Exposure to digital marketing and/or digital marketing platforms (email platforms, integrations with Google marketing platform, etc.).\xa0', 'Interview Process: 45 minute Zoom interview w/ hiring manager.  90 minute zoom interview w/ manager, solutions architect and engineer from the team\xa0', 'An employer is looking for a Data Engineer to sit remotely. You will have a strong knowledge of the Azure infrastructure and can build Azure pipelines. This role will be a 50/50 split of infrastructure and ETL for data to support use cases. For example, if you need to get data from point A to point B, being able to identify which service to use. Moreover, you will make general recommendations to the client on how to improve the current infrastructure. You will follow an Agile process and have a mix of project based work and support work; partner with solution architects, troubleshoot, and provide internal improvements to the infrastructure and current deployments.\xa0\xa0', 'Duration:\xa06 months w/ on-going extensions\xa0', 'Must Haves']

["Education:Bachelor's, human behavior related field (HCI, Psychology, Sociology, Information Science, Economics, Political Science, etc.) ", 'Company Industry:\xa0TechnologyOpportunity:\xa0The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a\xa0UX ResearcherCommitment Level:\xa040 hours per week, on-site, contract through March 2021 ', 'Commitment Level:', 'What you’ll do:•Primary responsibility includes running monthly qualitative research sessions across the org on a variety of exploratory and evaluative research questions•Work with multiple product teams as well as collaborating with different product teams across the company.•Work closely with product teams and other researchers to identify research questions•Design and execute studies that address both user behavior and attitudes, using the right methodology for the right questions•Work cross-functionally with design, product management, data science, content strategy, engineering, and marketing•Communicate insights in creative and compelling ways•Lead and deliver research share-outs to a cross-functional team to encourage empathy with and understanding of the organization’s experience for different segments•Identify clear opportunities the organization can address to improve the experience ', 'Company Industry:', 'Opportunity:', 'Now for the Perks!● Health Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life (including spouse & child), 401k, STD/LTD, AD&D, and Commuter Benefits program)● Accrued PTO: Up to 15 days per 12 months on assignment● New Child Benefit: Up to $4,000 for the birth or adoption of a child while on assignment (conditions apply)', 'Our Customer’s mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together. Through their family of apps and services, they are building a different kind of company that connects billions of people around the world, gives them ways to share what matters most to them, and helps bring people closer together. ', "Must Haves:•Needs to have spent significant time working in a product development setting (actually working with the product development team). Consultant only type work isn't preferred.•Knowledge of qualitative (heavy emphasis here), quantitative and user-centered research methods (e.g., interviewing, ethnography, surveys, co-design, concept-testing, etc.)•Practical experience running heuristic evaluations, cognitive walkthroughs and usability research.•Experience in applied product research•Proven ability to synthesize data from multiple sources in order to best represent user needs•Experience with SQL is a bonus•Experience working remotely is a bonus•Should be excellent presenters and build high-quality pres. decks•Well versed conducting remote research (heuristic evaluations will be very important) ", 'Nice to Have:•MA/MS/PhD, human behavior related field (HCI, Psychology, Sociology, Information Science, Economics, Political Science, etc.) ', 'Overview:We are seeking a UX Researcher on a contract basis to help support our client’s day to day business needs. ', ' ', 'Hours & Location:M-F, 40 hours/week. Work will be done from home until offices can safely re-open, at which time this role may be asked to come onsite. The expectation is to be onsite at New York, NY location once it is deemed safe to do so. ']

['', 'Ph.D. in biochemistry, pharmacology, or neuroscience with at least 5+ years of relevant post-doctoral and / or industry experience in neurologic and/ or muscle and/ or cardiovascular monogenic diseases that includes a robust publication record and experience with in vitro physiology of disease models. ', 'Deep knowledge of molecular, biochemical and pharmacologic techniques required to examine target expression, modulation and function. ', 'Expert in all aspects of neuronal cell biology with a deep understanding of synaptic physiology and higher throughput approaches to assess neuronal cell function. Deep knowledge of molecular, biochemical and pharmacologic techniques required to examine target expression, modulation and function. Demonstrated ability to perform in vitro electrophysiological recordings in primary rodent or human iPS neurons. Specifically, experience in the cell culture techniques; electrical recording and data analysis utilizing multi-electrode arrays is required. Experience in whole cell patch clamp techniques in either clonal or primary cultured cells (including neurons) is desired. Proficiency in development of optical and image-based assay approaches and software for analysis of electrophysiologic experiments is desired (i.e., MATLAB). Ability to identify and solve technical issues that arise with electrophysiology equipment, especially high throughput electrophysiological recording equipment is required. job_title: Director to Executive Director, Clinical Research Scientist
job_text: ['', 'Essential Functions Of The Job (Key Responsibilities)', 'Write abstracts and present data at scientific meetings, both internally and externally.', 'Will lead the clinical matrix teams for assigned compounds.', 'Monitor, review and summarize safety and efficacy data in ongoing studies.', 'Ability to multi-task and work in a fast-paced environment.', " Development of protocols for clinical studies. Preparation of clinical development plans. Drafting of clinical scientific documents such as IND, IND amendments, Investigator Brochures, Annual Reports and other FDA submissions. Monitor, review and summarize safety and efficacy data in ongoing studies. Assist with study design for exploratory development. Will lead the clinical matrix teams for assigned compounds. Represent exploratory development on project teams. Develop relationships with appropriate consultants. Write abstracts and present data at scientific meetings, both internally and externally. Serve as liaison to project teams, CRO's and others.", "Serve as liaison to project teams, CRO's and others.", 'Preparation of clinical development plans.', 'Development of protocols for clinical studies.', 'Job Summary (Primary Function)', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills.', 'Assist with study design for exploratory development.', ' Degree in scientific/life-sciences field. Pharm.D. or Ph.D. preferred. Minimum of 4 - 6 years of experience in research with at least 3 or more years of drug development experience are required. Prior Oncology Drug Development experience a plus. Ability to multi-task and work in a fast-paced environment. Excellent written and oral communication skills. Strong Analytical ability.', 'Drafting of clinical scientific documents such as IND, IND amendments, Investigator Brochures, Annual Reports and other FDA submissions.', 'Strong Analytical ability.', 'Develop relationships with appropriate consultants.', 'Degree in scientific/life-sciences field. Pharm.D. or Ph.D. preferred.', 'Represent exploratory development on project teams.', 'Prior Oncology Drug Development experience a plus.', 'Minimum of 4 - 6 years of experience in research with at least 3 or more years of drug development experience are required.']

job_text: ['', 'Bachelor degree or equivalent experience in a related quantitative fieldExperience accessing and retrieving data from disparate large data sources, by creating and tuning SQL queries. ['', " You're excited about collaborating closely with team members and other departments. You love resolving user pain points. You are empathetic, comfortable making decisions that are representative of and beneficial to the people you're designing for. You're unafraid of challenging the status quo. You're passionate about all things UX and other areas of design and innovation. You have an inquisitive mind and like to ask thoughtful and relevant questions. You're a skilled storyteller with the ability to communicate effectively. You're a self-starter. You understand the need to balance the urgent with the important, along with the essential logistics and project management that comes with it. ", "You're unafraid of challenging the status quo.", 'You understand the need to balance the urgent with the important, along with the essential logistics and project management that comes with it.', 'Work closely with marketing and product management teams to identify research topics and objectives', 'Develop and moderate research studies and experiments, such as in-person and remote interviews, surveys, card sorting, A/B testing , field research, etc.', 'Experience conducting research in a fast-paced/agile environment', "Inspire cross-functional teams to explore and understand our clients' experiences and needs, uncovering meaningful human-centered insights that drive exceptional design", '1-2 years of hands-on experience with a variety of qualitative and quantitative research techniques, along with the knowledge of when and why to apply them', " We offer competitive health benefits. Right off the bat we offer our employees 17 days of vacation and 6 sick days because we understand the value of relaxation, spending time with friends and family, and seeing the world. We are committed to growing our employees as well as our company; being a part of ThankView will open up a variety of opportunities in terms of development and career growth (and the stats to prove it as more than 20% of our staff have been promoted since they joined). ['', 'Able to work closely with other UX researchers to help design research plans and specific studies, as well as communicate findings with stakeholders and drive impact of the work.', '#LI-WC1', 'Able to drive impact through a range of research approaches and tools, including literature review, qualitative methods (observation, contextual inquiry, interview), usability, experimentation, & survey research.', 'Work experience in the AR/VR space or other emerging technologies ', '5+ years of experience in product UX research', 'Passion for consumer technology ', 'ABOUT THIS FEATURED OPPORTUNITY ', '5+ years of experience in product UX researchKnowledge of qualitative and quantitative research methods Experience with survey design and response effects Experience in one or more phases of the product lifecycle, from early generative research, to concept evaluation, to ship, to in-market UX research Passion for consumer technology Experience shipping consumer hardware and wearable technologies Experience working with design teams Work experience in the AR/VR space or other emerging technologies Strong skills in qualitative research and analysis Experience with Matlab, Python, R is a plusAble to drive impact through a range of research approaches and tools, including literature review, qualitative methods (observation, contextual inquiry, interview), usability, experimentation, & survey research.Experience leveraging hardware prototypes and sensors to collect user data related to human perception, human performance etc.Able to work closely with other UX researchers to help design research plans and specific studies, as well as communicate findings with stakeholders and drive impact of the work.Able to work independently executing research, including data collection, data analysis, reporting, shareouts, and knowledge consolidation.Able to coordinate with teammates and run multiple studies in parallel Able to work effectively with cross-functional partners (e.g., industrial design, UX design, hardware & software engineering, PM) to ensure our research accounts for their needs and creates a complete picture of the user experience.', 'Experience in one or more phases of the product lifecycle, from early generative research, to concept evaluation, to ship, to in-market UX research ', 'Experience working with design teams ', 'You will work with other UX researchers as well as multi-disciplinary hardware and software teams to push the boundaries of what is possible in the AR/VR product and research science spaces. Ultimately, your expertise and ingenuity in research must do more than just contribute to knowledge - you must also be skilled at driving measurable positive impact on the product and user experience.', 'KEY SUCCESS FACTORS', 'Able to coordinate with teammates and run multiple studies in parallel Able to work effectively with cross-functional partners (e.g., industrial design, UX design, hardware & software engineering, PM) to ensure our research accounts for their needs and creates a complete picture of the user experience.', 'Experience shipping consumer hardware and wearable technologies ', 'We are looking for a motivated mixed-methods (qual + quant) UX researcher with excellent communication and people skills. Strong candidates will demonstrate a rigorous approach to UX research methods as well as have experience developing solution concepts and shipping consumer products. ', 'Strong skills in qualitative research and analysis ', '\ufeffTHE OPPORTUNITY FOR YOU\xa0\xa0', 'Knowledge of qualitative and quantitative research methods ', 'Experience leveraging hardware prototypes and sensors to collect user data related to human perception, human performance etc.', 'Experience with survey design and response effects ', 'Experience with Matlab, Python, R is a plus', 'Able to work independently executing research, including data collection, data analysis, reporting, shareouts, and knowledge consolidation.']

['', 'Develop transformation logic to convert disparate datasets into Aetion’s proprietary format.\xa0Work with the Science team to develop this logic in Spark UDFs\xa0executed over a Spark cluster.Assess, develop, troubleshoot and enhance our measure system, which utilizes a combination of Java, Scala, Python, and R.\xa0Modify JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) files to describe the schemas of the datasets, ensuring system functionality through routine maintenance and testing.\xa0Work on a full-stack rapid-cycle analytic application.\xa0Develop highly effective, performant, and scalable components capable of handling large amounts of data for over 10 million patients.\xa0Work with the Science and Product teams to understand and assess client needs, and to ensure optimal system efficiency.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or a related field.4 years of experience in the position offered or related position, including 4 years of experience with: designing, developing, maintaining large-scale data ETL pipelines using Java/Scala in AWS, Hadoop, Spark, and DataBricks to manage Apache Spark infrastructure.Experience building backend modules, low latency REST API in distributed environment using Java, Docker, SQL, MVN, Spring, Jenkins.Experience writing complex SQL queries, UDFs to process large amounts of data across relational, non-relational databases, JSON and Spark SQLs.Experience translating requirements from product, DevOps teams to technology solutions using SDLC.\xa0', 'Your primary responsibility will be developing transformation logic against disparate datasets in Aetion Evidence Platform. You will work closely with our Product and Science team in developing custom transformation logic for longitudinal data, which is in Python, Scala, and R UDFs and executed over a Spark cluster. In addition, you will be integral in developing and enhancing our platform and its connections to Spark and a combination of big data infrastructure.', 'Social and energetic offices – with a modern layout, and a giant kitchen and eating/social area. We have an open floor plan with an abundance of conference rooms, designed for impromptu collaboration, company gatherings, and industry meetups and events.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or a related field.', 'Description\xa0', 'Work on a full-stack rapid-cycle analytic application.\xa0', 'Welcome to Aetion! Since our debut in 2013, we have grown into one of the country’s leading science-driven technology companies using real-world evidence to provide innovative healthcare solutions.', '***This role is open in both Los Angeles, CA and New York, NY***', 'Qualifications', '4 years of experience in the position offered or related position, including 4 years of experience with: designing, developing, maintaining large-scale data ETL pipelines using Java/Scala in AWS, Hadoop, Spark, and DataBricks to manage Apache Spark infrastructure.', 'Work with the Science and Product teams to understand and assess client needs, and to ensure optimal system efficiency.\xa0', 'The Company', 'Modify JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) files to describe the schemas of the datasets, ensuring system functionality through routine maintenance and testing.\xa0', 'Experience building backend modules, low latency REST API in distributed environment using Java, Docker, SQL, MVN, Spring, Jenkins.', 'Required', 'Responsibilities', 'Develop highly effective, performant, and scalable components capable of handling large amounts of data for over 10 million patients.\xa0', 'Experience translating requirements from product, DevOps teams to technology solutions using SDLC.\xa0', "Lead at all levels – Aetion is a diverse workforce of scientific thought leaders and technological innovators coming together with a vision to dramatically improve the Healthcare industry.\xa0Aetion supports and maintains a presence in organizations such as ISPOR, ISPE, ASHP, and HIMSS.\xa0Located in three cities — We have offices located in Midtown Manhattan near Penn Station, Boston's financial district, and Los Angeles. All locations are accessible by various forms of public transportation.Social and energetic offices – with a modern layout, and a giant kitchen and eating/social area. We have an open floor plan with an abundance of conference rooms, designed for impromptu collaboration, company gatherings, and industry meetups and events.\xa0Great perks – We offer competitive salaries, top-of-the-line benefits, company ownership stock options, 401(k) and unlimited PTO", 'About Aetion', 'Develop transformation logic to convert disparate datasets into Aetion’s proprietary format.\xa0', 'To continue our mission to transform healthcare, we’re assembling a team of talented individuals who know how to work collaboratively and authentically, to innovate and think transformation, not status quo.\xa0', 'Aetion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Aetion is committed to being an employer of choice, not just a good place to work, but a great and inclusive place to work. To that end, we strive to recruit and maintain a workforce that meaningfully represents the diverse and culturally rich communities that we serve. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status or disabled status or, genetic information.', 'We achieve this with our Aetion Evidence Platform, a software platform used to evaluate the safety, effectiveness and value of medications, delivering better outcomes to patients, medical professionals and clients.\xa0We’ve partnered with top biopharma companies and are backed by leading venture capital firms to help increase our medical research and expand our product line.', 'Great perks – We offer competitive salaries, top-of-the-line benefits, company ownership stock options, 401(k) and unlimited PTO', 'Assess, develop, troubleshoot and enhance our measure system, which utilizes a combination of Java, Scala, Python, and R.\xa0', 'Lead at all levels – Aetion is a diverse workforce of scientific thought leaders and technological innovators coming together with a vision to dramatically improve the Healthcare industry.\xa0Aetion supports and maintains a presence in organizations such as ISPOR, ISPE, ASHP, and HIMSS.\xa0', 'If that’s you, we’d love to hear from you.', 'Work with the Science team to develop this logic in Spark UDFs\xa0executed over a Spark cluster.', 'Experience writing complex SQL queries, UDFs to process large amounts of data across relational, non-relational databases, JSON and Spark SQLs.', "Located in three cities — We have offices located in Midtown Manhattan near Penn Station, Boston's financial district, and Los Angeles. All locations are accessible by various forms of public transportation.", 'The following duties include, but are not limited to:']

job_title: Senior AI Research Scientist – Perception in Mixed Reality & Robotics (Principal Level position also available)
job_text: ['Basic Qualifications', 'The ideal candidate will passionately drive and further advance innovations in the field of computer vision but not limited to machine learning based approaches. The work includes conducting advanced research and development of novel algorithms and guiding business units to bring innovation ideas to products. Responsibilities include but not limited to: ', 'Experience in product development in the above mentioned areas for consumer/enterprise markets ', 'FIRST Robotics (For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology) AWIM (A World In Motion) ', 'Publication record in top venues including CVPR, ICCV, ICRA, ISMAR, ECCV, NeurIPS, ICLR, TVCG, SIGGRAPH. Experience in working with hardware systems including sensors such as RGBD cameras, depth sensors, IMU, LIDAR, event cameras, etc. Experience in leading R&D project & team dealing with international customers. Experience in product development in the above mentioned areas for consumer/enterprise markets Strong leadership skills with excellent English communication & teamwork skills ', 'Job Description ', 'Actively scout for the emerging technologies and predict market trends by monitoring tech news, events and seminars. ', 'Work with an international team of experts to transfer the results of advanced research to Bosch business units. When necessary, build prototypes to verify research ideas. ', 'Experience in working with hardware systems including sensors such as RGBD cameras, depth sensors, IMU, LIDAR, event cameras, etc. ', 'Hands on experiences in computer vision and deep learning topics, focused on at least two of the following areas: object detection/image segmentation, 3D reconstruction, Mixed Reality/ Augmented Reality/ SLAM, SFM, sensor fusion, state estimations, etc. ', 'AWIM (A World In Motion) ', 'Qualifications', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Publication record in top venues including CVPR, ICCV, ICRA, ISMAR, ECCV, NeurIPS, ICLR, TVCG, SIGGRAPH. ', 'Experience in leading R&D project & team dealing with international customers. ', 'Strong leadership skills with excellent English communication & teamwork skills ', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science or Engineering 2+ years of industry experience in R&D for real-time, high quality computer vision and deep learning algorithms & systems. Hands on experiences in computer vision and deep learning topics, focused on at least two of the following areas: object detection/image segmentation, 3D reconstruction, Mixed Reality/ Augmented Reality/ SLAM, SFM, sensor fusion, state estimations, etc. Programming experience in C++, Python, or Java and hands on experience with libraries such as OpenCV, Tensorflow, and PyTorch. ', '2+ years of industry experience in R&D for real-time, high quality computer vision and deep learning algorithms & systems. ', 'Summarize research findings in high-quality paper and/or patent submissions. ', 'Conduct advanced research and engineering in computer vision and machine learning/deep learning to address challenges of mixed reality, visual sensing and robotics for different Bosch application areas. Work with an international team of experts to transfer the results of advanced research to Bosch business units. When necessary, build prototypes to verify research ideas. Actively scout for the emerging technologies and predict market trends by monitoring tech news, events and seminars. Provide expert opinions on relevant technology areas to facilitate strategic planning, R&D roadmap development, and business investment. Summarize research findings in high-quality paper and/or patent submissions. ', 'Programming experience in C++, Python, or Java and hands on experience with libraries such as OpenCV, Tensorflow, and PyTorch. ', 'Provide expert opinions on relevant technology areas to facilitate strategic planning, R&D roadmap development, and business investment. ', 'Job Description', 'Additional Information ', 'BOSCH is a proud supporter of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics) Initiatives ', 'By choice, we are committed to a diverse workforce – EOE/Protected Veteran/Disabled.', 'Conduct advanced research and engineering in computer vision and machine learning/deep learning to address challenges of mixed reality, visual sensing and robotics for different Bosch application areas. job_title: Senior AI Research Scientist – Perception in Mixed Reality & Robotics (Principal Level position also available)
job_text: ['Basic Qualifications', 'The ideal candidate will passionately drive and further advance innovations in the field of computer vision but not limited to machine learning based approaches. The work includes conducting advanced research and development of novel algorithms and guiding business units to bring innovation ideas to products. Responsibilities include but not limited to: ', 'Experience in product development in the above mentioned areas for consumer/enterprise markets ', 'FIRST Robotics (For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology) AWIM (A World In Motion) ', 'Publication record in top venues including CVPR, ICCV, ICRA, ISMAR, ECCV, NeurIPS, ICLR, TVCG, SIGGRAPH. Experience in working with hardware systems including sensors such as RGBD cameras, depth sensors, IMU, LIDAR, event cameras, etc. Experience in leading R&D project & team dealing with international customers. Experience in product development in the above mentioned areas for consumer/enterprise markets Strong leadership skills with excellent English communication & teamwork skills ', 'Job Description ', 'Actively scout for the emerging technologies and predict market trends by monitoring tech news, events and seminars. ', 'Work with an international team of experts to transfer the results of advanced research to Bosch business units. When necessary, build prototypes to verify research ideas. ', 'Experience in working with hardware systems including sensors such as RGBD cameras, depth sensors, IMU, LIDAR, event cameras, etc. ', 'Hands on experiences in computer vision and deep learning topics, focused on at least two of the following areas: object detection/image segmentation, 3D reconstruction, Mixed Reality/ Augmented Reality/ SLAM, SFM, sensor fusion, state estimations, etc. ', 'AWIM (A World In Motion) ', 'Qualifications', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Publication record in top venues including CVPR, ICCV, ICRA, ISMAR, ECCV, NeurIPS, ICLR, TVCG, SIGGRAPH. ', 'Experience in leading R&D project & team dealing with international customers. ', 'Strong leadership skills with excellent English communication & teamwork skills ', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science or Engineering 2+ years of industry experience in R&D for real-time, high quality computer vision and deep learning algorithms & systems. Hands on experiences in computer vision and deep learning topics, focused on at least two of the following areas: object detection/image segmentation, 3D reconstruction, Mixed Reality/ Augmented Reality/ SLAM, SFM, sensor fusion, state estimations, etc. Programming experience in C++, Python, or Java and hands on experience with libraries such as OpenCV, Tensorflow, and PyTorch. ', '2+ years of industry experience in R&D for real-time, high quality computer vision and deep learning algorithms & systems. ', 'Summarize research findings in high-quality paper and/or patent submissions. ', 'Conduct advanced research and engineering in computer vision and machine learning/deep learning to address challenges of mixed reality, visual sensing and robotics for different Bosch application areas. Work with an international team of experts to transfer the results of advanced research to Bosch business units. When necessary, build prototypes to verify research ideas. Actively scout for the emerging technologies and predict market trends by monitoring tech news, events and seminars. Provide expert opinions on relevant technology areas to facilitate strategic planning, R&D roadmap development, and business investment. Summarize research findings in high-quality paper and/or patent submissions. ', 'Programming experience in C++, Python, or Java and hands on experience with libraries such as OpenCV, Tensorflow, and PyTorch. ', 'Provide expert opinions on relevant technology areas to facilitate strategic planning, R&D roadmap development, and business investment. ', 'Job Description', 'Additional Information ', 'BOSCH is a proud supporter of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics) Initiatives ', 'By choice, we are committed to a diverse workforce – EOE/Protected Veteran/Disabled.', 'Conduct advanced research and engineering in computer vision and machine learning/deep learning to address challenges of mixed reality, visual sensing and robotics for different Bosch application areas. ', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science or Engineering ', 'Additional Information', 'FIRST Robotics (For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology) ', 'Basic Qualifications ', 'Preferred Qualifications ', 'Qualifications ']

['', 'Oversight of drilling operations (installing soil borings requiring soil and rock descriptions, and monitoring wells installation)', 'Preparing periodic status/program reports', 'Candidates must also be able to meet the physical demands associated with performing field work, including lifting up to 75 pounds, working in a standing position for extended periods of time, working outdoors in inclement weather.', 'Office Responsibilities May Include The Following', 'Licensed geologist or on track to obtain a license.', 'Subcontractor oversight', 'Figure/map/boring log production', 'Assisting with writing and preparing technical reports, work plans, letters, and memoranda', 'Must have a minimum of 2+ years of directly related experience.', "Bachelor's Degree in Geology, Chemistry, or other related science field from an accredited college/university preferred, additional experience may be used in lieu of a degree (Other education, commensurate experience and demonstrated ability of individual may be substituted.)", 'Candidates must demonstrate strong communication skills, the ability to work well in a team environment, a strong background in MS Office, and desire to pursue a career in the environmental sector.', 'Operation and maintenance of surface remediation systems', 'This position requires both field and office work, field work may be performed at project sites with environmental media (e.g., soil, sediment, groundwater, surface water, etc.) impacted with hazardous substances and/or hazardous wastes.', ' This position requires both field and office work, field work may be performed at project sites with environmental media (e.g., soil, sediment, groundwater, surface water, etc.) impacted with hazardous substances and/or hazardous wastes. Candidates must also be able to meet the physical demands associated with performing field work, including lifting up to 75 pounds, working in a standing position for extended periods of time, working outdoors in inclement weather. Candidates must demonstrate strong communication skills, the ability to work well in a team environment, a strong background in MS Office, and desire to pursue a career in the environmental sector. The ideal candidate will have efficient time management and the flexibility required to support different project managers concurrently. ', 'Field Activities May Include The Following', ' Soil, groundwater, and air sampling in compliance with State/Federal standards Operation and maintenance of surface remediation systems Oversight of drilling operations (installing soil borings requiring soil and rock descriptions, and monitoring wells installation) Subcontractor oversight ', 'Required Skills', 'Coordinating work schedules with subcontractors', '  Data management (compilation, manipulation, and evaluation of data) Assisting with writing and preparing technical reports, work plans, letters, and memoranda Coordinating work schedules with subcontractors Conducting project related research (historical data, regulations, etc.) Preparing periodic status/program reports Figure/map/boring log production ', 'Conducting project related research (historical data, regulations, etc.)', 'The ideal candidate will have efficient time management and the flexibility required to support different project managers concurrently.', " Bachelor's Degree in Geology, Chemistry, or other related science field from an accredited college/university preferred, additional experience may be used in lieu of a degree (Other education, commensurate experience and demonstrated ability of individual may be substituted.) Licensed geologist or on track to obtain a license. Must have a minimum of 2+ years of directly related experience. ", ' Data management (compilation, manipulation, and evaluation of data)', 'Required Experience', 'Soil, groundwater, and air sampling in compliance with State/Federal standards']

Experiences Matter - which is why we continue to grow year over year. Working at Vivid Seats puts you front and center at the opportunity to scale our best in class platform that allows our fans to sit closer and experience more.\xa0\xa0', 'Proficiency in working in a Linux environment\xa0', 'Additional Experience of Interest:', '\ufeffLocation:\xa0', ':\xa0', 'Senior Data Engineer,\xa0', 'To be successful, you’ll need:\xa0', 'We are passionate about creating memorable experiences for our fans and the best in class experience for our employees. ', 'At Macys, data sits in the center of our business, providing insights into the effectiveness of our physical and digital product & features and customer experience. We believe data brings everything together and it is the only way we make decisions. Macys Enterprise Data, BI & Reporting is a team constantly striving to create an amazing experience for our customers and internal teams. We regard culture and trust highly and believe you will have positive influence in your own way. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Building self-service platforms to power Macys cross functional teams and drive the whole organization to be data driven. Serve data models as a product to entire organization. ', 'The Staff Software Engineer position reports to the Manager, Enterprise Data Engineering, and is responsible for the development and support of applications on a modern data lake, leveraging his/her expertise and knowledge of multiple systems/customer areas to help build a robust, scalable and reliable big data platform. He/she must have broad and deep technical understanding of the data technologies in the field of Big Data. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Maintain awareness of industry trends and evaluate applicability of new software tools to platform development. ', ' ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Lead team to deliver large-scale projects, set and drive roadmap execution through resource planning and allocation. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Architect and design large scale data analytics infrastructure in cloud (performance, reliability, monitoring, self-service). Provides technical leadership and mentoring to other team members. ', 'Experience in CI/CD, DevOps process and tools. ', 'Communication Skills:', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Serve as a coach and mentor to more junior developers to include delegating and managing tasks, as appropriate ', 'Education/Experience: ', '8+ years of experience in data engineering, batch and stream processing technologies, data science, and related data-centric fields using large-scale data environments. ', 'Good understanding of data engineering, ingestion and processing of data within Big Data ecosystems and performing complex query analysis on the data using cloud technologies, preferably with Google Cloud Platform would be a plus. ', 'Work Hours:', '5+ years of “hands on” experience with Python, Scala, Java developing ETL pipelines and data manipulation scripts using SQL, and modern relational, analytical and graph databases. ', 'Evaluate the applicability of leading-edge technologies and use this information to significantly influence future business strategies ', '\xa0 ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and/or Engineering with 10+ years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience; Master's degree preferred 8+ years of experience in data engineering, batch and stream processing technologies, data science, and related data-centric fields using large-scale data environments. 5+ years of “hands on” experience with Python, Scala, Java developing ETL pipelines and data manipulation scripts using SQL, and modern relational, analytical and graph databases. Good understanding of data engineering, ingestion and processing of data within Big Data ecosystems and performing complex query analysis on the data using cloud technologies, preferably with Google Cloud Platform would be a plus. Evaluate the applicability of leading-edge technologies and use this information to significantly influence future business strategies Hands-on experience and deep technical understanding of including (but not limited to) Hadoop, Spark, BigQuery, Composer, Dataflow, Pub/Sub, Kafka etc. Evaluate the applicability of leading-edge technologies and use this information to significantly influence future business strategies Work independently and provides technical guidance, applying in-depth knowledge of multiple technologies, as appropriate. Provides technical leadership and mentoring to other team members. Experience working closely with cross functional analytics and Data Science teams. Experience in CI/CD, DevOps process and tools. ", 'Reasoning Ability: Very strong analysis/troubleshooting skills, strong partnering/relationship building skills. Ability to consider options and make business decisions (e.g. selection of tools/methodologies for projects). ', 'Experience working closely with cross functional analytics and Data Science teams. ', 'Essential Functions', 'Physical Demands:', 'Qualifications ', "If you're passionate about building highly scalable data & analytics models and architecture in the cloud, and you are motivated to make an impact in creating robust and scalable data models used by every team, come join us. You will help shape the vision and architecture of Macy’s next generation of enterprise data landscape, making it easy for reporting, analytics, data scientist and other data consumer to build data-driven products, features and insights. You’ll be responsible for developing a reliable data & analytics architecture that scales with the company's incredible growth. You will be a part of an experienced engineering team and work with passionate leaders on challenging data space. ", 'https://www.macysjobs.com/Search/JobDetail/Staff-Software-Engineer-Daas-EDW/Johns-Creek/GA/MAC19746', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and/or Engineering with 10+ years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience; Master's degree preferred "]

['Preferred Skills and Knowledge:', '', 'THIS COULD BE YOUR OPPORTUNITY.', 'Haima Therapeutics is a pre-clinical stage biotechnology company located in Cleveland, OH focused on developing platelet-inspired therapies for the treatment of bleeding and other blood-related pathologies. Our lead program is a platelet-inspired, nanoparticle-based synthetic hemostatic technology, called SynthoPlate, that can staunch bleeding by amplifying your body’s natural clotting mechanisms. We are looking for entrepreneurial-minded individuals with experience and a desired to learn about biomaterials, nanotechnology, hemostasis, thrombosis, inflammation, or platelet biology. The candidate will ideally have in vivo experience. This is an exciting opportunity to join a biotechnology drug development startup company at the ground floor and grow with the company. There will be opportunities to grow with the company as the company progresses through the commercialization pathway.', 'I-PERF Fellows receive an annual base stipend of $78,000 per year, optional individual health and life insurance benefits, relocation assistance to the approved host company, a professional conference travel allowance, and scripted professional development training funded by the National Science Foundation.\xa0Spaces are expected to go quickly with more than 200 NSF approved companies expected to be eligible to participate in this program.', 'Relocation to Cleveland, OH', 'Manufacture nanoparticles using bioconjugate chemistry, molecular self-assembly, lyophilization, and purification techniquesCharacterize the physiochemical and functional properties of Haima’s drug technologies using standard and specialized techniquesPerform safety and efficacy evaluation in appropriatein vitro and in vivo modelsDesign, supervise and interpret quality control equipment, techniques and protocolsWrite proposals, develop a business plan, evaluate market data, interview customers…Relocation to Cleveland, OH', 'PhD in biology, chemistry, engineering, medicine or related engineering or medical majors', 'Characterize the physiochemical and functional properties of Haima’s drug technologies using standard and specialized techniques', 'ABOUT\xa0NSF I-PERF', '\xa0', 'in vitro', 'and', 'The primary responsibilities of this job include, but are not limited to the following:', 'Design, supervise and interpret quality control equipment, techniques and protocols', ' ', 'Nanotechnology manipulation, manufacturing, and lyophilization', 'Write proposals, develop a business plan, evaluate market data, interview customers…', 'Funded by the National Science Foundation (NSF), the Innovative Postdoctoral Entrepreneurial Research Fellowship (I-PERF) recruits, trains, mentors, matches, and funds early-career Science and Engineering (S&E) doctoral degree recipients to participate in innovative entrepreneurial activities at some of the nation’s most promising startup companies.', 'in vivo ', 'Hands onin vivo technical skills', 'Understanding of hemostasis, thrombosis, PK/PD pharmacology, and toxicity', 'Manufacture nanoparticles using bioconjugate chemistry, molecular self-assembly, lyophilization, and purification techniques', 'Haima Therapeutics Company Description', 'Strong written and verbal communication skillsPhD in biology, chemistry, engineering, medicine or related engineering or medical majorsUnderstanding of hemostasis, thrombosis, PK/PD pharmacology, and toxicityNanotechnology manipulation, manufacturing, and lyophilizationHands onin vivo technical skills', 'Have you ever wanted to use your skills at a high-tech start-up or even start your own company?', 'in vivo', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills', 'Perform safety and efficacy evaluation in appropriatein vitro and in vivo models', 'I-PERF addresses a national need to accelerate small business\xa0innovation\xa0in support of federal government research by providing small businesses with doctoral level expertise at a reduced cost and training the next generation of S&E PhDs in high-tech entrepreneurship.']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Senior scientist in the laboratory with primary responsibilities focused on novel clinical diagnostic assay development, optimization, validation and patient screening in clinical trials', 'The ideal candidate will possess a PhD in one of the following disciplines; Cell Biology, Molecular Biology, Genetics, Biochemistry or other pertinent areas of chemistry or biology, with 1-2 years of experience in oxidative stress or DNA damageCandidates with further expertise in reproductive biology and knowledge of analytical and spectroscopic techniques such as Flow Cytometry and/or immunohistochemistry are preferred.Experienced applicants with BSc or MSc degrees will be considered.', 'Experienced applicants with BSc or MSc degrees will be considered.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Key Duties with General Tasks and Responsibilities:', 'Preparing grant applications to national funding bodies (government and private foundations)', 'Bioanalytical Research Scientist / Biochemist', 'CellOxess is currently seeking a highly motivated research scientist with good communication skills. In this crucial role, you will be primarily functioning in the lab with our clinical collaborators at Universities and IVF Centers in the Greater Philadelphia Area. The position offers the candidate an excellent opportunity for rapid career progression in a small but fast growing company.', 'Industry:', 'Celloxess LLC is a privately held biotechnology with offices in Ewing, NJ.\xa0The company’s objective is to develop diagnostics and treatment for diseases implicated in chronic cell oxidative stress. The current focus is in reproductive health. The company has strong research ties with university departments and fertility centers in US, UK, France and Australia.', 'The ideal candidate will possess a PhD in one of the following disciplines; Cell Biology, Molecular Biology, Genetics, Biochemistry or other pertinent areas of chemistry or biology, with 1-2 years of experience in oxidative stress or DNA damage', 'Biotech / Healthcare, Natural Products / Reproductive Health / Infertility, DNA Damage Diagnostics', 'Additional opportunity to contribute to other research projects and generation of intellectual property, patents or trade secrets towards new product development', 'Job Title:', 'Salary & Compensation:', 'Preparing high-quality scientific reports for internal and external oral presentations with the aim to publish in peer-reviewed scientific journals.', 'The right candidate will be offered an attractive remuneration package, potentially including share options. Salary will be based on the level of experience and expertise.', 'Candidates with further expertise in reproductive biology and knowledge of analytical and spectroscopic techniques such as Flow Cytometry and/or immunohistochemistry are preferred.', 'Senior scientist in the laboratory with primary responsibilities focused on novel clinical diagnostic assay development, optimization, validation and patient screening in clinical trialsAdditional opportunity to contribute to other research projects and generation of intellectual property, patents or trade secrets towards new product developmentPreparing high-quality scientific reports for internal and external oral presentations with the aim to publish in peer-reviewed scientific journals.Preparing grant applications to national funding bodies (government and private foundations)']

job_text: ['', 'Demonstrated track record of scientific productivity in relevant areas of research', 'Qualifications', 'Experience in managing a core facility is preferred, although equivalent experience in the management of other complex programs or entities will be considered favorably also.', 'Ph.D or M.D. with well established experience and expertise in behavioral neuroscience', 'Outstanding interpersonal skills: ability to effectively interact with internal colleagues as well as external collaborators', 'Application instructions: Please submit CV and cover letter.', 'Knowledge of statistics and experience with relevant bioinformatics tools', 'Ph.D or M.D. with well established experience and expertise in behavioral neuroscienceMinimum of 3 years postdoctoral experience in a biomedical and/or research and development environment .Demonstrated track record of scientific productivity in relevant areas of researchExperience in managing a core facility is preferred, although equivalent experience in the management of other complex programs or entities will be considered favorably also.Knowledge of statistics and experience with relevant bioinformatics toolsOutstanding interpersonal skills: ability to effectively interact with internal colleagues as well as external collaboratorsExceptional verbal and written communication skills, and capability to effectively present scientific results to key stakeholdersHigh levels of motivation, creativity and independenceAttention to detail with excellent organizational and record keeping skills', 'Exceptional verbal and written communication skills, and capability to effectively present scientific results to key stakeholders', 'Minimum of 3 years postdoctoral experience in a biomedical and/or research and development environment .', 'High levels of motivation, creativity and independence', 'Attention to detail with excellent organizational and record keeping skills']

', 'Communication Skills:', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Serve as a coach and mentor to more junior developers to include delegating and managing tasks, as appropriate ', 'Education/Experience: ', '8+ years of experience in data engineering, batch and stream processing technologies, data science, and related data-centric fields using large-scale data environments. ', 'Good understanding of data engineering, ingestion and processing of data within Big Data ecosystems and performing complex query analysis on the data using cloud technologies, preferably with Google Cloud Platform would be a plus. ', 'Work Hours:', '5+ years of “hands on” experience with Python, Scala, Java developing ETL pipelines and data manipulation scripts using SQL, and modern relational, analytical and graph databases. ', 'Evaluate the applicability of leading-edge technologies and use this information to significantly influence future business strategies ', '\xa0 ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and/or Engineering with 10+ years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience; Master's degree preferred 8+ years of experience in data engineering, batch and stream processing technologies, data science, and related data-centric fields using large-scale data environments. 5+ years of “hands on” experience with Python, Scala, Java developing ETL pipelines and data manipulation scripts using SQL, and modern relational, analytical and graph databases. ', 'Essential Functions', 'Physical Demands:', 'Qualifications ', "If you're passionate about building highly scalable data & analytics models and architecture in the cloud, and you are motivated to make an impact in creating robust and scalable data models used by every team, come join us. You’ll be responsible for developing a reliable data & analytics architecture that scales with the company's incredible growth. You will be a part of an experienced engineering team and work with passionate leaders on challenging data space. ", "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and/or Engineering with 10+ years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience; Master's degree preferred "]

job_title: Field Application Scientist - NGS Data Analysis Software
job_text: ['', '- Engage in scientific discussions with customers and cultivate relationships.', '- Aptitude for understanding and communicating complex computational concepts, applications and algorithms to non-computer savvy biologists.', 'There are few players who have shaped the world of modern science and healthcare as much as QIAGEN, and we have only just started.', '- Using QIAGEN software tools, analyze customer data for presentations or analyze public data for case studies.', '\xa0', 'POSITION DESCRIPTION:', '- The scientist will work strategically with sales, marketing, customer support, and R&D teams to present the best solutions for pharmaceutical, biotech, government, hospital/medical, and academic customers and perspective customers.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '- Collaborate with Sales to develop and nurture key account technical relationships.', '- Support Marketing activities at targeted events.', '- Upgrade and develop demonstration examples and case studies to highlight product features and address specific biological questions.', 'PERSONAL REQUIREMENTS:', '-These products and services provide gene expression analysis, pathway analysis, sequence variant analysis, microbial metagenomics analysis and many other analyses\xa0types.\xa0', '- Demonstrated exceptional analytical and problem solving skills.', '- Become a power user of QIAGEN’s portfolio of bioinformatics software applications and effectively develop and present scientific examples to perspective customers as seminars, workshops, webinars, and at scientific conferences.', '- PhD or equivalent experience in molecular biology or genetics-related field, including wet-lab work, with focus on the biological interpretation of gene expression, sequence variant analysis, or microbial data analysis using analysis software. Post-doctoral is desired, and existing field application scientist work is highly desired.', '- Ability to travel between 30-60% of the time.', '- Demonstrated excellent written, presentation, and verbal communications skills including demonstrated public speaking experience.', 'At the heart of QIAGEN’s business is a vision to make improvements in life possible.', 'OVERVIEW:', '- Work closely with customers to understand their product requirements, and communicate these requirements to the Marketing and engineering teams for inclusion in future product development activities.', 'POSITION REQUIREMENTS:', 'We are on an exciting mission to make a real difference in science and healthcare. We are still the entrepreneurial company we started out as and have today achieved a size where we can bring our full power to many initiatives and to our presence across the globe.', '- The Field Application Scientist - NGS Data Analysis is responsible for delivering scientific software demonstrations for groups of various size, conducting software product trainings, and other activities that convey the value of QIAGEN’s bioinformatics analysis applications and services.', '-\xa0Preferred home base location: Texas', '- Leverage deep scientific knowledge to identify customer challenges and map them to QIAGEN’s bioinformatics software products and services.', '- This is a field-based (home office with travel) role and candidates should be prepared to experience episodic periods of travel up to 60%; however, average yearly levels will be typically be 30-40%. Travel will depend on home office location.', '- Train and support new customers including delivering product-training seminars on the QIAGEN’s bioinformatics software products and applications.', '- Excellent interpersonal and relationship-building skills with ability to work as a team.', '- Provide scientific presentations and compelling pre-sales product demonstration for potential customers within the context of the customer’s research field and application.', '- Ability to multitask a variety of assignments and proven ability to meet strict deadlines.', 'Our most valuable asset are our employees – more than 5000 in over 35 locations around the world. Our ambition is to ensure we have outstanding and passionate people working in the best teams and we are constantly looking for new talent to join us.\xa0', 'Join us. At QIAGEN, you make a difference every day.', 'If you are looking to advance your career, are seeking new challenges and opportunities, enjoy working in dynamic and international, diverse teams and want to make a real impact on people’s lives, then QIAGEN is where you need to be.', '- Understanding of and interest in the challenges of information discovery in the life sciences domain.', '- Deliver scientific workshops on defined case studies to showcase the value and effectiveness of software applications within the context of the prospect or customer’s research.', '- Experience with Ingenuity Pathway Analysis, Omicsoft, or CLC Genomics Workbench software is desired.', 'This Field Application Scientist - NGS Data Analysis Software position is an exciting role that allows you, as a scientist, to interact with and enable a wide range of researchers across different scientific disciplines using QIAGEN’s bioinformatics analysis software applications and services that provide superior –omics data analysis and biological interpretation.\xa0']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Pre-prod and from Pre-prod to Production.', 'Location: Scottsdale, AZ / Austin, TX / Omaha, NE', ' Hadoop -->Cloud(GCP', 'Title: Data Engineer with GCP', '-->', 'migrating data from Teradata ', 'Job Description:Extensive experience in Data warehousing (ETL, Teradata & Informatica)Extensive experience in migrating data from Teradata --> Hadoop -->Cloud(GCP) and solid experience in Pre-prod and from Pre-prod to Production.Hands-on Experience in Big Data technologies - Hadoop, Sqoop, Hive and Spark .Hands-on experience with GCP Compute, Storage and Security components.Hands-on experience with using Cloud Platform provided Big Data technologies (i.e. Databricks, Dataproc, Pub/Sub, BigQuery, Data flow etc.)Experience in migrating workload from on-premise to cloud and cloud to cloud migrations .Hands-on experience in setting up Cloud platforms for use-cases.']

['', 'Experience partnering with product management to define and drive roadmaps to include user-centric features.', 'Partner with cross-functional teams to turn business and product curiosities into actionable research plans.', 'Application Requirements', 'Contribute to the development of product strategy and roadmap through user advocacy and dissemination of insights.', '\xa0', 'Collaborate with Product Management and Product Design to generate concepts that solve problems for our users.', 'Opening in downtown San Francisco with an industry leader in the health care space at intersection of some of the hottest markets in MedTech – cardiology, wearables, and artificial intelligence. Company is publicly held, had 6 consecutive years of 50% year over year growth and gone from 200 to over 1000 people in the last 3 years. Great opportunity for a company working on products that are making real changes in peoples lives. ', 'Responsibilities include:', 'Lead and mentor UX Researchers within projects and through the development of their craft.', 'Combine quantitative and qualitative data to evaluate the success of features during pilots and post-launch.', 'Minimum 5 years of experience integrating user research into product design practices, preferably in the medical device or health and wellness domain.', 'About this Role', 'Iteratively test concepts with appropriate user groups; analyze data to identify the best direction for achieving project goals and user needs.', 'A portfolio or writing example that exhibits your creative and thoughtful approach to solving a usability challenge and your overall research process', "We are seeking an experienced Senior UX Researcher who is passionate about improving people's lives through design and technology. Your hands-on, multi-method abilities will help define and drive users experiences across our software and hardware products used by patients and healthcare professionals. In this role, you’ll build an understanding of what our users need while collaborating with product design, engineering, product management, and other functions to help define the future of our product platform. We’re looking for thinkers and innovators who are willing to challenge the status quo and are energized by developing creative solutions to complex problems.", 'Willing to travel up to 20% of the time to conduct user research.', 'Demonstrated ability to identify product opportunities by connecting user problems, analytics, and business goals.', 'Confidently present your findings and recommendations in compelling ways to obtain buy-in from cross-functional stakeholders.', 'Recruit, screen, and coordinate participants to ensure we have the right participants in our studies.', 'We work hard to bring beautifully crafted experiences in both form and function into the medical device space. Being part of the UX team means bringing the voice of our patients and healthcare professionals to the forefront of conversations about new initiatives and product features. This user-centric mindset frequently drives us out of the office and into the field to learn more about the challenges our users face and the broader context in which are products are used. We enjoy designing mobile apps, websites, hardware products, and packaging that embrace these challenges – whether it’s a doctor having a busy day at the hospital or one of our more senior patients applying a heart monitor at home.\xa0', 'Extensive experience selecting and executing qualitative methods such as interviews, contextual inquiry, focus groups, diary studies, and concept/usability evaluation.', 'Bachelor’s/Master’s in Human Factors, Psychology, Anthropology, Cognitive Science, Biomedical Engineering, or related field.', "Partner with cross-functional teams to turn business and product curiosities into actionable research plans.Design and lead mixed-method studies to help project teams learn about our users' attitudes and behaviors.Collaborate with Product Management and Product Design to generate concepts that solve problems for our users.Lead and mentor UX Researchers within projects and through the development of their craft.Recruit, screen, and coordinate participants to ensure we have the right participants in our studies.Iteratively test concepts with appropriate user groups; analyze data to identify the best direction for achieving project goals and user needs.Confidently present your findings and recommendations in compelling ways to obtain buy-in from cross-functional stakeholders.Contribute to the development of product strategy and roadmap through user advocacy and dissemination of insights.Build a panel of research participants and devise creative methods to keep them actively engaged.Combine quantitative and qualitative data to evaluate the success of features during pilots and post-launch.", 'Proven ability to self-direct and lead multiple research projects.Extensive experience selecting and executing qualitative methods such as interviews, contextual inquiry, focus groups, diary studies, and concept/usability evaluation.Proven ability to communicate research findings and insights to cross-functional teams and job_title: Sr. Associate Scientist / Scientist I, Antibody Engineering
job_text: ['', "Ph.D. with 2+ years of research experience in molecular biology, protein engineering, antibody engineering, biochemistry, structural biology or related field, or Master's/Bachelor's degree with 5+ years of industry experience with proven record of accomplishments and publications.", 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with an ability to work both independently and in a team environment', 'What You’ll Bring', 'Perform antibody production, characterization and biochemical / biophysical analysis in high-throughput manner', 'Strong technical expertise in wide range of molecular biology and protein engineering techniques, including mutagenesis, molecular cloning, construct design, protein expression and purification, protein interaction characterization (ELISA, BIAcore, Octet) and sequence analysis', " Ph.D. with 2+ years of research experience in molecular biology, protein engineering, antibody engineering, biochemistry, structural biology or related field, or Master's/Bachelor's degree with 5+ years of industry experience with proven record of accomplishments and publications. Strong technical expertise in wide range of molecular biology and protein engineering techniques, including mutagenesis, molecular cloning, construct design, protein expression and purification, protein interaction characterization (ELISA, BIAcore, Octet) and sequence analysis Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with an ability to work both independently and in a team environment Critical thinking with high degree of innovative and analytical skills ", 'Collaborate with therapeutic leads to plan the strategy for antibody discovery and optimization engineering', 'Interpret, record and present complex biological data', 'What You’ll Do', 'Execute antibody engineering to improve desired properties for therapeutic development using molecular biology approaches including phage display and mutagenesis', 'Support large-scale antibody sequence and structural model analysis', 'Who We Are', 'Communicate and collaborate with other colleagues effectively', ' Execute antibody engineering to improve desired properties for therapeutic development using molecular biology approaches including phage display and mutagenesis Perform antibody production, characterization and biochemical / biophysical analysis in high-throughput manner Support large-scale antibody sequence and structural model analysis Collaborate with therapeutic leads to plan the strategy for antibody discovery and optimization engineering Interpret, record and present complex biological data Communicate and collaborate with other colleagues effectively ', 'Note: Job title will be commensurate with experience and academic credentials.', 'About Us', 'Critical thinking with high degree of innovative and analytical skills']

Rank of Postdoctoral Associate requires an doctoral degree earned within the past four years in physics, physical chemistry, biophysics or a closely related field. All degree requirements must be completed before the appointment can begin. Experience in preparation and characterization of biomimetic membranes, membrane-protein complexes, or similar systems. Proven skills in data modeling and analysis. Demonstrated ability to communicate research results in peer-reviewed publications.', ' Proven skills in data modeling and analysis.', ' Rank of Research Associate requires an advanced degree physics, physical chemistry, biophysics or a closely related field.', ' Experience in x-ray or neutron scattering experimentation and analysis.', 'Review Date', 'Appointment Type', ' Experience in x-ray or neutron scattering experimentation and analysis. ['We are inviting applications for a full-time postdoctoral scholar to contribute to inclusive excellence research and activities in higher education. The initial appointment will begin by fall of 2020 and could extend for two years. The scholar will work with Dr. Baker (PI) Professor of Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery and Biochemistry. Our research programs are funded by a five-year project aimed to elucidate mechanisms of resolution of inflammation and tissue regeneration in epithelial cells. The vision is to create new therapies to help head and neck cancer patients undergoing radiation therapy as well as patients with autoimmune diseases suffering from hyposalivation. We aim to develop new technologies to understand the causes of diseases and create novel approaches to restore primarily salivary gland function but other secretory epithelia as well. Please send your CV plus three references to: bakero@health.missouri.edu']

job_title: Sr. Principal Scientist-In Vivo Lead, Translational Sciences
job_text: ['', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Eligible for Employee Referral Bonus', 'Ph.D. in Cancer Biology, Immunology, Biochemistry, Genetics or equivalent experience in a related discipline with > 8 years post Ph.D. industry experience with technical and scientific expertise in drug discovery and pre-clinical development.Supervisory, mentoring and leadership experience required.Experience in collaborative research in Oncology Drug Discovery programs.Expertise in animal models of human cancer including CDX, PDX and syngeneic models required.Expertise with GEMM and humanized models highly desirable. Hands on experience in in vivo skills (IV, PO dosing, blood/tissue collections).Strong publication record in Tumor intrinsic biology or equivalent achievements in industry desired.Excellent oral and written communication skills. Proficiency in all common and scientific software.Candidate demonstrates a breadth of diverse leadership experiences and capabilities including the ability to influence and collaborate with peers, develop and coach others, oversee and guide the work of other colleagues to achieve meaningful outcomes and create business impact.', 'Provide interpretation of model systems in the context of clinical translatability.', 'Expertise with GEMM and humanized models highly desirable. Hands on experience in in vivo skills (IV, PO dosing, blood/tissue collections).', 'Role Summary', 'Other Job Details', 'Possess excellent verbal and written communication skills to thrive in a fast-paced matrix environment.', 'Serve as the in vivo Pharmacology lead on several drug discovery projects.', 'EEO & Employment Eligibility', 'Establish scientific in vivo strategy and study plans for drug discovery projects.Track record of managing small teams and supervising/mentoring scientists.Serve as the in vivo Pharmacology lead on several drug discovery projects.Works within the multi-functional teams to support target identification, validation, drug discovery, and combination therapy.Works across the in vivo teams in a highly collaborative manner, sharing expertise and resources to meet study needs across Translational Sciences.Design and conduct in vivo studies to evaluate and establish efficacy, PK/PD relationship, combination strategy, biomarker identification and analysis.Develop and characterize new in vivo mouse models including genetically engineered mouse (GEM) models to study biologic mechanisms and support exploration of novel cancer therapeutics. This will be achieved through leveraging the expertise of both internal and external thought leaders to develop models with greater clinical translatability.Provide interpretation of model systems in the context of clinical translatability.The Sr. Principal Scientist will generate and be accountable for the necessary Animal Use Protocols that ensures team members comply with all internal policies and regulatory requirements. Drives data interpretation, presentation and documentation of experiments as well as preparation of study reports including drafting in vivo sections of regulatory documents such as IND filings. Responsible for contribution to relevant in vivo sections of study reports and regulatory documents, i.e. IND filings. Written and verbal presentation of results within a multidisciplinary team environment. Ensure that projects have all critical in vivo data to enable project stage dependent decisions. Publication of results in scientific peer-reviewed journals and presentations at internal, national, and international meetings.Possess excellent verbal and written communication skills to thrive in a fast-paced matrix environment.', 'Eligible for Relocation Package', 'Eligible for Relocation PackageEligible for Employee Referral Bonus', 'Track record of managing small teams and supervising/mentoring scientists.', 'Role Responsibilities', 'The Sr. Principal Scientist will generate and be accountable for the necessary Animal Use Protocols that ensures team members comply with all internal policies and regulatory requirements. ', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills. Proficiency in all common and scientific software.', 'Works across the in vivo teams in a highly collaborative manner, sharing expertise and resources to meet study needs across Translational Sciences.', 'Drives data interpretation, presentation and documentation of experiments as well as preparation of study reports including drafting in vivo sections of regulatory documents such as IND filings. Responsible for contribution to relevant in vivo sections of study reports and regulatory documents, i.e. IND filings. Written and verbal presentation of results within a multidisciplinary team environment. Ensure that projects have all critical in vivo data to enable project stage dependent decisions. Publication of results in scientific peer-reviewed journals and presentations at internal, national, and international meetings.', 'Design and conduct in vivo studies to evaluate and establish efficacy, PK/PD relationship, combination strategy, biomarker identification and analysis.', 'Ph.D. in Cancer Biology, Immunology, Biochemistry, Genetics or equivalent experience in a related discipline with > 8 years post Ph.D. industry experience with technical and scientific expertise in drug discovery and pre-clinical development.', 'Develop and characterize new in vivo mouse models including genetically engineered mouse (GEM) models to study biologic mechanisms and support exploration of novel cancer therapeutics. This will be achieved through leveraging the expertise of both internal and external thought leaders to develop models with greater clinical translatability.', 'Experience in collaborative research in Oncology Drug Discovery programs.', 'Strong publication record in Tumor intrinsic biology or equivalent achievements in industry desired.', 'Establish scientific in vivo strategy and study plans for drug discovery projects.', 'Works within the multi-functional teams to support target identification, validation, drug discovery, and combination therapy.', 'Supervisory, mentoring and leadership experience required.', 'Candidate demonstrates a breadth of diverse leadership experiences and capabilities including the ability to influence and collaborate with peers, develop and coach others, oversee and guide the work of other colleagues to achieve meaningful outcomes and create business impact.', 'Sunshine Act', 'Expertise in animal models of human cancer including CDX, PDX and syngeneic models required.']
